10181532Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CountdownLatchDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    private int m_remain;Di2015NewLine    private EventWaitHandle m_event;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CountdownLatch(int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      m_remain = count;Di2015NewLine      m_event = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Signal()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      // The last thread to signal also sets the event.Di2015NewLine      if (Interlocked.Decrement(ref m_remain) == 0)Di2015NewLine        m_event.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Wait()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      m_event.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

10185009Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class EnumUtilsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public static string stringValueOf(Enum value)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var fi = value.GetType().GetField(value.ToString());Di2015NewLine    var attributes = (DescriptionAttribute[]) fi.GetCustomAttributes( typeof(DescriptionAttribute), false);Di2015NewLine    if (attributes.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return attributes[0].Description;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return value.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static object enumValueOf(string value, Type enumType)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    string[] names = Enum.GetNames(enumType);Di2015NewLine    foreach (string name in names)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (stringValueOf((Enum)Enum.Parse(enumType, name)).Equals(value))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine          return Enum.Parse(enumType, name);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentException("The string is not a description or value of the specified enum.");Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10193155Di2015UniqueSeparatorconvert2binary(10)Di2015NewLine-> remainder, final = 0Di2015NewLine-> result = ""Di2015NewLine-> NaN (= false)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineloop:Di2015NewLineDecimal > 0, so: remainder = Decimal % 2 (= 0) and Decimal /= 2 ( = 5)Di2015NewLineresult = remainder + result = 0 + ""Di2015NewLineNaN = falseDi2015NewLinerepeat:Di2015NewLineDecimal > 0, so: remainder = Decimal % 2 (= 1) and Decimal /= 2 ( = 2)Di2015NewLineresult = remainder + result = "10"Di2015NewLineNaN = falseDi2015NewLinerepeat:Di2015NewLineDecimal > 0, so: remainder = Decimal % 2 (= 0) and Decimal /= 2 ( = 1)Di2015NewLineresult = remainder + result = "010"Di2015NewLineNaN = falseDi2015NewLinerepeat:Di2015NewLineDecimal > 0, so: remainder = Decimal % 2 (= 1) and Decimal /= 2 ( = 0)Di2015NewLineresult = remainder + result = "1010"Di2015NewLineNaN = falseDi2015NewLinerepeat: WHOOPS: Decimal == 0, so we return the final (int representation) of result.Di2015NewLine
10193155Di2015UniqueSeparator%2
10193155Di2015UniqueSeparator/=2
10193155Di2015UniqueSeparatordecimal(10) == 1 * 2^3 + 0 * 2^2 + 1 * 2^1 + 0 * 2^0 = binary(1010)Di2015NewLine
10193155Di2015UniqueSeparatorint.ToString()
10193155Di2015UniqueSeparator% 10
10193155Di2015UniqueSeparatorint number = 123;Di2015NewLine// this is equivalent to: (1 * 10^2) + (2 * 10^1) + (3 * 10^0)Di2015NewLineint remainder = number % 10; // remainder = 3Di2015NewLinenumber /= 10 // number = 12 (integer division!!)Di2015NewLineresult = remainder + ""; // result = "3"Di2015NewLine// number is now: (1 * 10^1) + (2 * 10^0), because we divided by 10!Di2015NewLineremainder = number % 10; // remainder = 2Di2015NewLinenumber /= 10 // number = 1Di2015NewLineresult = remainder + result; // result = "23"Di2015NewLine// number is now: (1 * 10^0)Di2015NewLineremainder = number % 10; // remainder = 1Di2015NewLinenumber /= 10 // number = 0 - we're going to STOP now!Di2015NewLineresult = remainder + result; // result = "123"Di2015NewLine// yay! hurray!!Di2015NewLine

10193539Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class NameDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static string Of(LambdaExpression selector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (selector == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("selector");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var mexp = selector.Body as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine        if (mexp == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var uexp = (selector.Body as UnaryExpression);Di2015NewLine            if (uexp == null)Di2015NewLine                throw new TargetException(Di2015NewLine                    "Cannot determine the name of a member using an expression because the expression provided cannot be converted to a '" +Di2015NewLine                    typeof(UnaryExpression).Name + "'."Di2015NewLine                );Di2015NewLine            mexp = uexp.Operand as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (mexp == null) throw new TargetException(Di2015NewLine            "Cannot determine the name of a member using an expression because the expression provided cannot be converted to a '" +Di2015NewLine            typeof(MemberExpression).Name + "'."Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine        return mexp.Member.Name;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string Of<TSource>(Expression<Func<TSource, object>> selector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Of<TSource, object>(selector);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string Of<TSource, TResult>(Expression<Func<TSource, TResult>> selector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Of(selector as LambdaExpression);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class NameExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static string NameOf<TSource, TResult>(this TSource obj, Expression<Func<TSource, TResult>> selector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Name.Of(selector);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10196250Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class StudentDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public List<string> CourseIds { get; set; }Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class CourseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Id { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Credit { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ViewModel : INotifyPropertyChangedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public ObservableCollection<Course> StudentCourses { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public ObservableCollection<Student> Students { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Student SelectedComboItemDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return selectedComboItem_; }Di2015NewLine        set {Di2015NewLine            selectedComboItem_ = value;Di2015NewLine            StudentCourses.Clear();Di2015NewLine            foreach(Course course in courses_)Di2015NewLine                if(selectedComboItem_.CourseIds.Contains(course.Id))Di2015NewLine                    StudentCourses.Add(course);Di2015NewLine            PropertyChanged(this, new PropertyChangedEventArgs("SelectedComboItem"))    ;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private List<Course> courses_ = new List<Course>();Di2015NewLine    private Student selectedComboItem_;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ... // Read DB and build collectionsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event PropertyChangedEventHandler PropertyChanged;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10196265Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid chart1_SelectionRangeChanged(object sender, CursorEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Given the visible (zoomed) range on X, Di2015NewLine    // it zooms the same relative range on Y:Di2015NewLine    // i.e. if on the X axis, the range 5% - 30% is zoomed, Di2015NewLine    // it zooms the same range on Y.Di2015NewLine    var axisY = this.chart1.ChartAreas[0].AxisY;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var totalXRange = e.Axis.Maximum - e.Axis.Minimum;Di2015NewLine    var totalYRange = axisY.Maximum - axisY.Minimum;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var ySelectionStart = (e.Axis.ScaleView.ViewMinimum - e.Axis.Minimum) *Di2015NewLine                          totalYRange / totalXRange;Di2015NewLine    var ySelectionEnd = (e.Axis.ScaleView.ViewMaximum - e.Axis.Minimum) * Di2015NewLine                         totalYRange / totalXRange;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    axisY.ScaleView.Zoom(ySelectionStart,ySelectionEnd);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10196265Di2015UniqueSeparatorAxisValueChanged
10196265Di2015UniqueSeparatorAxisViewChanged
10196265Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid chart1_SelectionRangeChanged(object sender, CursorEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var axisY = this.chart1.ChartAreas[0].AxisY;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var xRangeStart = e.Axis.ScaleView.ViewMinimum;Di2015NewLine    var xRangeEnd = e.Axis.ScaleView.ViewMaximum;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // compute the Y values for the points crossing the range edgesDi2015NewLine    double? yRangeStart = null;Di2015NewLine    var pointBeforeRangeStart = this.chart1.Series[0].Points.FirstOrDefault(x => x.XValue <= xRangeStart);Di2015NewLine    var pointAfterRangeStart = this.chart1.Series[0].Points.FirstOrDefault(x => x.XValue > xRangeStart);Di2015NewLine    if (pointBeforeRangeStart != null && pointAfterRangeStart != null)Di2015NewLine        yRangeStart = Interpolate2Points(pointBeforeRangeStart, pointAfterRangeStart, xRangeStart);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    double? yRangeEnd = null;Di2015NewLine    var pointBeforeRangeEnd = this.chart1.Series[0].Points.FirstOrDefault(x => x.XValue <= xRangeEnd);Di2015NewLine    var pointAfterRangeEnd = this.chart1.Series[0].Points.FirstOrDefault(x => x.XValue > xRangeEnd);Di2015NewLine    if (pointBeforeRangeEnd != null && pointAfterRangeEnd != null)Di2015NewLine        yRangeEnd = Interpolate2Points(pointBeforeRangeEnd, pointAfterRangeEnd, xRangeEnd);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var edgeValues = new[] { yRangeStart, yRangeEnd }.Where(x => x.HasValue).Select(x => x.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // find the points inside the rangeDi2015NewLine    var valuesInRange = this.chart1.Series[0].PointsDi2015NewLine    .Where(p => p.XValue >= xRangeStart && p.XValue <= xRangeEnd)Di2015NewLine    .Select(x => x.YValues[0]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // find the minimum and maximum Y valuesDi2015NewLine    var values = valuesInRange.Concat(edgeValues);Di2015NewLine    double yMin;Di2015NewLine    double yMax;Di2015NewLine    if (values.Any())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yMin = values.Min();Di2015NewLine        yMax = values.Max();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yMin = this.chart1.Series[0].Points.Min(x => x.YValues[0]);Di2015NewLine        yMax = this.chart1.Series[0].Points.Max(x => x.YValues[0]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // zoom Y-axis to [yMin - yMax]Di2015NewLine    axisY.ScaleView.Zoom(yMin, yMax);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// see: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linear_interpolation#Linear_interpolation_between_two_known_pointsDi2015NewLinepublic static double Interpolate2Points(DataPoint p1, DataPoint p2, double x)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var x0 = p1.XValue;Di2015NewLine    var y0 = p1.YValues[0];Di2015NewLine    var x1 = p2.XValue;Di2015NewLine    var y1 = p2.YValues[0];Di2015NewLine    return y0 + ((x - x0) * y1 - (x - x0) * y0) / (x1 - x0);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10199293Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Point GetHandlePoint(int value) {Di2015NewLine  Point result = Point.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (value == 1)Di2015NewLine    result = new Point(areaRect.Left, areaRect.Top);Di2015NewLine  else if (value == 2)Di2015NewLine    result = new Point(areaRect.Left, areaRect.Top + (areaRect.Height / 2));Di2015NewLine  else if (value == 3)Di2015NewLine    result = new Point(areaRect.Left, areaRect.Bottom);Di2015NewLine  else if (value == 4)Di2015NewLine    result = new Point(areaRect.Left + (areaRect.Width / 2), areaRect.Top);Di2015NewLine  else if (value == 5)Di2015NewLine    result = new Point(areaRect.Left + (areaRect.Width / 2), areaRect.Bottom);Di2015NewLine  else if (value == 6)Di2015NewLine    result = new Point(areaRect.Right, areaRect.Top);Di2015NewLine  else if (value == 7)Di2015NewLine    result = new Point(areaRect.Right, areaRect.Top + (areaRect.Height / 2));Di2015NewLine  else if (value == 8)Di2015NewLine    result = new Point(areaRect.Right, areaRect.Bottom);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Rectangle GetHandleRect(int value) {Di2015NewLine  Point p = GetHandlePoint(value);Di2015NewLine  p.Offset(-2, -2);Di2015NewLine  return new Rectangle(p, new Size(5, 5));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10199293Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Rectangle areaRect = new Rectangle(100, 100, 300, 300);Di2015NewLineprivate Rectangle oldRect;Di2015NewLineprivate int dragHandle = 0;Di2015NewLineprivate Point dragPoint;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic Form1() {Di2015NewLine  InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine  this.DoubleBuffered = true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected override void OnMouseDown(MouseEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine  for (int i = 1; i < 9; i++) {Di2015NewLine    if (GetHandleRect(i).Contains(e.Location)) {Di2015NewLine      dragHandle = i;Di2015NewLine      oldRect = areaRect;Di2015NewLine      dragPoint = GetHandlePoint(i);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  base.OnMouseDown(e);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected override void OnMouseMove(MouseEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine  if (dragHandle == 1) {Di2015NewLine    // to doDi2015NewLine  } else if (dragHandle == 2) {Di2015NewLine    int diff = dragPoint.X - e.Location.X;Di2015NewLine    areaRect = new Rectangle(oldRect.Left - diff, oldRect.Top, oldRect.Width + diff, oldRect.Height);Di2015NewLine  } else if (dragHandle == 7) {Di2015NewLine    int diff = dragPoint.X - e.Location.X;Di2015NewLine    areaRect = new Rectangle(oldRect.Left, oldRect.Top, oldRect.Width - diff, oldRect.Height);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (dragHandle > 0)Di2015NewLine    this.Invalidate();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  base.OnMouseMove(e);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected override void OnMouseUp(MouseEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine  dragHandle = 0;Di2015NewLine  base.OnMouseUp(e);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected override void OnPaint(PaintEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine  e.Graphics.DrawRectangle(Pens.Red, areaRect);Di2015NewLine  for (int i = 1; i < 9; i++) {Di2015NewLine    e.Graphics.FillRectangle(Brushes.DarkRed, GetHandleRect(i));Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  base.OnPaint(e);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10200460Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string ChangePassword(string adminUser, string adminPassword,Di2015NewLine    string domain, string container, string userName, string newPassword)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PrincipalContext principalContext = Di2015NewLine            new PrincipalContext(ContextType.Domain, domain, container, Di2015NewLine                adminUser, adminPassword);Di2015NewLine        UserPrincipal user = UserPrincipal.FindByIdentity(principalContext, userName);Di2015NewLine        if (user == null) return "User Not Found In This Domain";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        user.SetPassword(newPassword);Di2015NewLine        return user.Name;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ex.Message;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10200460Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string ChangePassword20(string adminUser, string adminPassword,Di2015NewLine    string container, string domainController, string userName, string newPassword)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const AuthenticationTypes authenticationTypes = AuthenticationTypes.Secure |Di2015NewLine        AuthenticationTypes.Sealing | AuthenticationTypes.ServerBind;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    DirectoryEntry searchRoot = null;Di2015NewLine    DirectorySearcher searcher = null;Di2015NewLine    DirectoryEntry userEntry = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        searchRoot = new DirectoryEntry(String.Format("LDAP://{0}/{1}", Di2015NewLine            domainController, container), Di2015NewLine            adminUser, adminPassword, authenticationTypes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        searcher = new DirectorySearcher(searchRoot);Di2015NewLine        searcher.Filter = String.Format("sAMAccountName={0}", userName);Di2015NewLine        searcher.SearchScope = SearchScope.Subtree;Di2015NewLine        searcher.CacheResults = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SearchResult searchResult = searcher.FindOne(); ;Di2015NewLine        if (searchResult == null) return "User Not Found In This Domain";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        userEntry = searchResult.GetDirectoryEntry();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        userEntry.Invoke("SetPassword", new object[] { newPassword });Di2015NewLine        userEntry.CommitChanges();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return "New password set";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ex.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (userEntry != null) userEntry.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        if (searcher != null) searcher.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        if (searchRoot != null) searchRoot.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10203562Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web.Security;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web.SessionState;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This code demonstrates how to make session state available in HttpModule,Di2015NewLine// regradless of requested resource.Di2015NewLine// author: Tomasz JastrzebskiDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MyHttpModule : IHttpModuleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   public void Init(HttpApplication application)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      application.PostAcquireRequestState += new EventHandler(Application_PostAcquireRequestState);Di2015NewLine      application.PostMapRequestHandler += new EventHandler(Application_PostMapRequestHandler);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   void Application_PostMapRequestHandler(object source, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      HttpApplication app = (HttpApplication)source;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if (app.Context.Handler is IReadOnlySessionState || app.Context.Handler is IRequiresSessionState) {Di2015NewLine         // no need to replace the current handlerDi2015NewLine         return;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // swap the current handlerDi2015NewLine      app.Context.Handler = new MyHttpHandler(app.Context.Handler);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   void Application_PostAcquireRequestState(object source, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      HttpApplication app = (HttpApplication)source;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      MyHttpHandler resourceHttpHandler = HttpContext.Current.Handler as MyHttpHandler;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if (resourceHttpHandler != null) {Di2015NewLine         // set the original handler backDi2015NewLine         HttpContext.Current.Handler = resourceHttpHandler.OriginalHandler;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // -> at this point session state should be availableDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      Debug.Assert(app.Session != null, "it did not work :(");Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // a temp handler used to force the SessionStateModule to load session stateDi2015NewLine   public class MyHttpHandler : IHttpHandler, IRequiresSessionStateDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      internal readonly IHttpHandler OriginalHandler;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      public MyHttpHandler(IHttpHandler originalHandler)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         OriginalHandler = originalHandler;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      public void ProcessRequest(HttpContext context)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         // do not worry, ProcessRequest() will not be called, but let's be safeDi2015NewLine         throw new InvalidOperationException("MyHttpHandler cannot process requests.");Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      public bool IsReusableDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         // IsReusable must be set to false since class has a member!Di2015NewLine         get { return false; }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10204137Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string ReadLastLine(string path)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string returnValue = "";Di2015NewLine            FileStream fs = new FileStream(path, FileMode.Open);Di2015NewLine            for (long pos = fs.Length - 2; pos > 0; --pos)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                fs.Seek(pos, SeekOrigin.Begin);               Di2015NewLine                StreamReader ts = new StreamReader(fs);Di2015NewLine                returnValue = ts.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine                int eol = returnValue .IndexOf("\\n");Di2015NewLine                if (eol >= 0)Di2015NewLine                {                    Di2015NewLine                    fs.Close();Di2015NewLine                    return returnValue .Substring(eol + 1);Di2015NewLine                }                Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            fs.Close();Di2015NewLine            return returnValue ;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

10207276Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string FormatUrl(string Url, bool IncludeHttp = null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Url = Url.ToLower();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    switch (IncludeHttp) {Di2015NewLine        case true:Di2015NewLine            if (!(Url.StartsWith("http://") || Url.StartsWith("https://")))Di2015NewLine                Url = "http://" + Url;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case false:Di2015NewLine            if (Url.StartsWith("http://"))Di2015NewLine                Url = Url.Remove(0, "http://".Length);Di2015NewLine            if (Url.StartsWith("https://"))Di2015NewLine                Url = Url.Remove(0, "https://".Length);Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Url;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10210220Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic byte[] GetFile(string filename)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  byte[] binFile = null;Di2015NewLine  tryDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    using (var aStream = File.Open(filename, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      BinaryReader binReader = new BinaryReader(aStream);Di2015NewLine      binFile = new byte[binReader.BaseStream.Length];Di2015NewLine      binReader.BaseStream.Position = 0; // <= this step should not be necessaryDi2015NewLine      binFile = binReader.ReadBytes(binReader.BaseStream.Length);Di2015NewLine      binReader.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  } catch (IOException err) {Di2015NewLine    // file is being used by another process.Di2015NewLine  } catch (ObjectDisposedException err) {Di2015NewLine    // I am guessing you would never see this because your binFile is not disposedDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return binFile;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10210220Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Test() {Di2015NewLine  DirectoryInfo dir = new DirectoryInfo(Environment.GetFolderPath(Environment.SpecialFolder.Personal));Di2015NewLine  foreach (var subDir in dir.GetDirectories()) {Di2015NewLine    if (-1 < subDir.Name.ToLower().IndexOf("pictures")) {Di2015NewLine      foreach (var file in subDir.GetFiles()) {Di2015NewLine        byte[] data = GetFile(file.FullName);Di2015NewLine        if (data != null) {Di2015NewLine          Console.WriteLine(data.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic byte[] GetFile(string filename) {Di2015NewLine  byte[] result = null;Di2015NewLine  try {Di2015NewLine    if (File.Exists(filename)) {Di2015NewLine      int len = 0;Di2015NewLine      FileInfo file = new FileInfo(filename);Di2015NewLine      byte[] data = new byte[file.Length];Di2015NewLine      using (BinaryReader br = new BinaryReader(file.Open(FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read))) {Di2015NewLine        len = br.Read(data, 0, data.Length);Di2015NewLine        br.Close();Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      if (0 < len) {Di2015NewLine        if (len == data.Length) {Di2015NewLine          return data;Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine          // this section of code was never triggered in my tests;Di2015NewLine          // however, it is good to keep it as a backup.Di2015NewLine          byte[] dat2 = new byte[len];Di2015NewLine          Array.Copy(data, dat2, len);Di2015NewLine          return dat2;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  } catch (IOException err) {Di2015NewLine    // file is being used by another process.Di2015NewLine  } catch (ObjectDisposedException err) {Di2015NewLine    // I am guessing you would never see this because your binFile is not disposedDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10210647Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void DiasShow()     Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var getFiles = Directory.GetFiles(HttpContext.Current.Server.MapPath("/CSS/Design/Page_Design/Dias/1920x1080/")); //Find alle filer I en mappe     Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var random = RandomiseList(getFiles);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var txt = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var randomFileName in random)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var fileType = System.IO.Path.GetExtension(randomFileName).ToUpper(); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ((fileType == ".JPG") || (fileType == ".JPEG")) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           var imageName = System.IO.Path.GetFileName(randomFileName); Di2015NewLine           txt.Append("<img src=\\"CSS/Design/Page_Design/Dias/1920x1080/" + imageName+ "\\" />");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    lbl_Dias.Text += txt.ToString();Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine public static T[] RandomiseList<T>(T[] source)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine     var rand = new Random(); //no need for own seedDi2015NewLine     var list = new List<T>(source); //copy to a new list which we can remove fromDi2015NewLine     var result = new T[source.Length];Di2015NewLine     for (int i = 0; i < source.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         var listIndex = rand.Next(list.Count());Di2015NewLine         result[i]= list[listIndex];Di2015NewLine         list.RemoveAt(listIndex);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     return result;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

10218831Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic abstract class AccountDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  protected double _balance;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public abstract bool Credit(double amount);Di2015NewLine  public abstract bool Debit(double amount);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class SavingAccount : AccountDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public double MinimumBalance { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override bool Debit(double amount)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (amount < 0)Di2015NewLine      return Credit(-amount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    double temp = _balance;Di2015NewLine    temp = temp - amount;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (temp < MinimumBalance)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      _balance = temp;Di2015NewLine      return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override bool Credit(double amount)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (amount < 0)Di2015NewLine      return Debit(-amount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    _balance += amount;Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

May fire multiple times due to keyboard repeat.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public static event KeyEventHandler KeyDown;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Event raised when a key has been released.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public static event KeyEventHandler KeyUp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        delegate IntPtr WndProc(IntPtr hWnd, uint msg, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static bool initialized;Di2015NewLine        static IntPtr prevWndProc;Di2015NewLine        static WndProc hookProcDelegate;Di2015NewLine        static IntPtr hIMC;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //various Win32 constants that we needDi2015NewLine int WM_IME_SETCONTEXT = 0x0281;Di2015NewLine        const int WM_INPUTLANGCHANGE = 0x51;Di2015NewLine        const int WM_GETDLGCODE = 0x87;Di2015NewLine        const int WM_IME_COMPOSITION = 0x10f;Di2015NewLine        const int DLGC_WANTALLKEYS = 4;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Win32 functions that we're usingDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("Imm32.dll", CharSet = CharSet.Unicode)]Di2015NewLine        static extern IntPtr ImmGetContext(IntPtr hWnd);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("Imm32.dll", CharSet = CharSet.Unicode)]Di2015NewLine        static extern IntPtr ImmAssociateContext(IntPtr hWnd, IntPtr hIMC);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("user32.dll", CharSet = CharSet.Unicode)]Di2015NewLine        static extern IntPtr CallWindowProc(IntPtr lpPrevWndFunc, IntPtr hWnd, uint Msg, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("user32.dll", CharSet = CharSet.Unicode)]Di2015NewLine        static extern int SetWindowLong(IntPtr hWnd, int nIndex, int dwNewLong);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Initialize the TextInput with the given GameWindow.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="window">The XNA window to which text input should be linked.</param>Di2015NewLine        public static void Initialize(GameWindow window)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (initialized)Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException("TextInput.Initialize can only be called once!");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            hookProcDelegate = new WndProc(HookProc);Di2015NewLine            prevWndProc = (IntPtr)SetWindowLong(window.Handle, GWL_WNDPROC,Di2015NewLine                (int)Marshal.GetFunctionPointerForDelegate(hookProcDelegate));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            hIMC = ImmGetContext(window.Handle);Di2015NewLine            initialized = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static IntPtr HookProc(IntPtr hWnd, uint msg, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IntPtr returnCode = CallWindowProc(prevWndProc, hWnd, msg, wParam, lParam);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            switch (msg)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case WM_GETDLGCODE:Di2015NewLine                    returnCode = (IntPtr)(returnCode.ToInt32() | DLGC_WANTALLKEYS);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                case WM_KEYDOWN:Di2015NewLine                    if (KeyDown != null)Di2015NewLine                        KeyDown(null, new KeyEventArgs((Keys)wParam));Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                case WM_KEYUP:Di2015NewLine                    if (KeyUp != null)Di2015NewLine                        KeyUp(null, new KeyEventArgs((Keys)wParam));Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                case WM_CHAR:Di2015NewLine                    if (CharEntered != null)Di2015NewLine                        CharEntered(null, new CharacterEventArgs((char)wParam, lParam.ToInt32()));Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                case WM_IME_SETCONTEXT:Di2015NewLine                    if (wParam.ToInt32() == 1)Di2015NewLine                        ImmAssociateContext(hWnd, hIMC);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                case WM_INPUTLANGCHANGE:Di2015NewLine                    ImmAssociateContext(hWnd, hIMC);Di2015NewLine                    returnCode = (IntPtr)1;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return returnCode;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10222878Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IKeyboardSubscriberDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    void RecieveTextInput(char inputChar);Di2015NewLine    void RecieveTextInput(string text);Di2015NewLine    void RecieveCommandInput(char command);Di2015NewLine    void RecieveSpecialInput(Keys key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool Selected { get; set; } //or FocusedDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class KeyboardDispatcherDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public KeyboardDispatcher(GameWindow window)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        EventInput.EventInput.Initialize(window);Di2015NewLine        EventInput.EventInput.CharEntered += new EventInput.CharEnteredHandler(EventInput_CharEntered);Di2015NewLine        EventInput.EventInput.KeyDown += new EventInput.KeyEventHandler(EventInput_KeyDown);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void EventInput_KeyDown(object sender, EventInput.KeyEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_subscriber == null)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _subscriber.RecieveSpecialInput(e.KeyCode);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void EventInput_CharEntered(object sender, EventInput.CharacterEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_subscriber == null)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        if (char.IsControl(e.Character))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //ctrl-vDi2015NewLine            if (e.Character == 0x16)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //XNA runs in Multiple Thread Apartment state, which cannot recieve clipboardDi2015NewLine                Thread thread = new Thread(PasteThread);Di2015NewLine                thread.SetApartmentState(ApartmentState.STA);Di2015NewLine                thread.Start();Di2015NewLine                thread.Join();Di2015NewLine                _subscriber.RecieveTextInput(_pasteResult);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _subscriber.RecieveCommandInput(e.Character);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _subscriber.RecieveTextInput(e.Character);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IKeyboardSubscriber _subscriber;Di2015NewLine    public IKeyboardSubscriber SubscriberDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _subscriber; }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_subscriber != null)Di2015NewLine                _subscriber.Selected = false;Di2015NewLine            _subscriber = value;Di2015NewLine            if(value!=null)Di2015NewLine                value.Selected = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Thread has to be in Single Thread Apartment state in order to receive clipboardDi2015NewLine    string _pasteResult = "";Di2015NewLine    [STAThread]Di2015NewLine 10222878Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic delegate void TextBoxEvent(TextBox sender);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class TextBox : IKeyboardSubscriberDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Texture2D _textBoxTexture;Di2015NewLine    Texture2D _caretTexture;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SpriteFont _font;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int X { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Y { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Width { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Height { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Highlighted { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool PasswordBox { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event TextBoxEvent Clicked;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string _text = "";Di2015NewLine    public String TextDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _text;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _text = value;Di2015NewLine            if (_text == null)Di2015NewLine                _text = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (_text != "")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //if you attempt to display a character that is not in your fontDi2015NewLine                //you will get an exception, so we filter the charactersDi2015NewLine                String filtered = "";Di2015NewLine                foreach (char c in value)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (_font.Characters.Contains(c))Di2015NewLine                        filtered += c;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                _text = filtered;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (_font.MeasureString(_text).X > Width)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //recursion to ensure that text cannot be larger than the boxDi2015NewLine                    Text = _text.Substring(0, _text.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TextBox(Texture2D textBoxTexture, Texture2D caretTexture, SpriteFont font)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _textBoxTexture = textBoxTexture;Di2015NewLine        _caretTexture = caretTexture;Di2015NewLine        _font = font;           Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _previousMouse = Mouse.GetState();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MouseState _previousMouse;Di2015NewLine    public void Update(GameTime gameTime)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MouseState mouse = Mouse.GetState();Di2015NewLine        Point mousePoint = new Point(mouse.X, mouse.Y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Rectangle position = new Rectangle(X, Y, Width, Height);Di2015NewLine        if (position.Contains(mousePoint))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Highlighted = true;Di2015NewLine            if (_previousMouse.LeftButton == ButtonState.Released && mouse.LeftButton == ButtonState.Pressed)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (Clicked != null)Di2015NewLine                    Clicked(this);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Highlighted = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Draw(SpriteBatch spriteBatch, GameTime gameTime)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool caretVisible = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ((gameTime.TotalGameTime.TotalMilliseconds % 1000) < 500)Di2015NewLine            caretVisible = false;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            caretVisible = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        String toDraw = Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (PasswordBox)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            toDraw = "";Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < Text.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                toDraw += (char) 0x2022; //bullet character (make sure you include it in the font!!!!)Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //my texture was split vertically in 2 parts, upper was unhighlighted, lower was highlighted version of the boxDi2015NewLine        spriteBatch.Draw(_textBoxTexture, new Rectangle(X, Y, Width, Height), new Rectangle(0, Highlighted ? (_textBoxTexture.Height / 2) : 0, _textBoxTexture.Width, _textBoxTexture.Height / 2), Color.White);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Vector2 size = _font.MeasureString(toDraw);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (caretVisible && Selected)Di2015NewLine            spriteBatch.Draw(_caretTexture, new Vector2(X + (int)size.X + 2, Y + 2), Color.White); //my caret texture was a simple vertical line, 4 pixels smaller than font size.YDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //shadow first, then the actual textDi2015NewLine        spriteBatch.DrawString(_font, toDraw, new Vector2(X, Y) + Vector2.One, Color.Black);Di2015NewLine        spriteBatch.DrawString(_font, toDraw, new Vector2(X, Y), Color.White);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void RecieveTextInput(char inputChar)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Text = Text + inputChar;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void RecieveTextInput(string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Text = Text + text;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void RecieveCommandInput(char command)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (command)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case '\\b': //backspaceDi2015NewLine                if (Text.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine                    Text = Text.Substring(0, Text.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '\\r': //returnDi2015NewLine                if (OnEnterPressed != null)Di2015NewLine                    OnEnterPressed(this);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '\\t': //tabDi2015NewLine                if (OnTabPressed != null)Di2015NewLine                    OnTabPressed(this);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void RecieveSpecialInput(Keys key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event TextBoxEvent OnEnterPressed;Di2015NewLine    public event TextBoxEvent OnTabPressed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool SelectedDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get;Di2015NewLine        set;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10224029Di2015UniqueSeparator// Returns the file-system path for a given path.Di2015NewLinepublic static string GetMappedPath(string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (HostingEnvironment.IsHosted)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!Path.IsPathRooted(path))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // We are about to call MapPath, so need to ensure that Di2015NewLine            // we do not pass an absolute path.Di2015NewLine            // Di2015NewLine            // We use HostingEnvironment.MapPath, rather than Di2015NewLine            // Server.MapPath, to allow this method to be usedDi2015NewLine            // in application startup. regPath);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string GetDefaultRegistryValue(RegistryKey rootKey, string regPath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var regPermission = new RegistryPermission(RegistryPermissionAccess.Read,Di2015NewLine                                                       @"HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\\" + regPath);Di2015NewLine            regPermission.Demand();Di2015NewLine            using (var regKey = rootKey.OpenSubKey(regPath))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (regKey != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string defaultValue = (string) regKey.GetValue("");Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return errorDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return "";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string GetDLLDirectoryFromProgID(string progID)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine maximumPropertyValueLength)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    USES_CONVERSION;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumWbemClassObject* pEnumerator = NULL;Di2015NewLine    HRESULT result =     break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            VARIANT objectProperty;Di2015NewLine            result = pQueryObject->Get(propertyName, 0, &objectProperty, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine            if 10229673Di2015UniqueSeparatorstd::string GetProcessorId()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine int info[4] = { -1 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine __cpuid(info, 0);Di2015NewLine if (info[0] < 1)Di2015NewLine  return ""; // Not supported?!Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine // Up to you...you do not need to mask results and you may useDi2015NewLine // features bits "as is".    Di2015NewLine __cpuid(info, 1);Di2015NewLine int family = info[0] & 0xf00;Di2015NewLine int features = info[3] & 0xf000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine std::stringstream id;Di2015NewLine id << std::hex << std::setw(4) << std::setfill('0') << family << features;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine return id.str();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

"your.ico"));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void CreateShortcut(string folder, string name, string target, string description, string targetIcon){Di2015NewLinestring shortcutFullName = Path.Combine(folder, name + ".lnk");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinetry{Di2015NewLine    WshShell shell = new WshShellClass();Di2015NewLine    IWshShortcut link = (IWshShortcut)shell.CreateShortcut(shortcutFullName);Di2015NewLine    link.TargetPath = target;Di2015NewLine    link.Description = description;Di2015NewLine    FileInfo fi = new 10229916Di2015UniqueSeparatornew Form()
10230011Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class FibonacciHeap<TKey, TValue>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    readonly List<Node> _root = new List<Node>();Di2015NewLine    int _count;Di2015NewLine    Node _min;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Push(TKey key, TValue value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Insert(new Node {Di2015NewLine            Key = key,Di2015NewLine            Value = valueDi2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }       Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue> Peek()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_min == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLine        return new KeyValuePair<TKey,TValue>(_min.Key, _min.Value);Di2015NewLine    }       Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue> Pop()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_min == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLine        var min = ExtractMin();Di2015NewLine        return new KeyValuePair<TKey,TValue>(min.Key, min.Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void Insert(Node node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _count++;Di2015NewLine        _root.Add(node);Di2015NewLine        if (_min == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _min = node;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (Comparer<TKey>.Default.Compare(node.Key, _min.Key) < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _min = node;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Node ExtractMin()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var result = _min;Di2015NewLine        if (result == null)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var child in result.Children)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            child.Parent = null;Di2015NewLine            _root.Add(child);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _root.Remove(result);Di2015NewLine        if (_root.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _min = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _min = _root[0];Di2015NewLine            Consolidate();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _count--;Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void Consolidate()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var a = new Node[UpperBound()];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < _root.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var x = _root[i];Di2015NewLine            var d = x.Children.Count;Di2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {   Di2015NewLine                var y = a[d];Di2015NewLine                if (y == null)Di2015NewLine                    break;                  Di2015NewLine                if (Comparer<TKey>.Default.Compare(x.Key, y.Key) > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var t = x;Di2015NewLine                    x = y;Di2015NewLine                    y = t;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                _root.Remove(y);Di2015NewLine                i--;Di2015NewLine                x.AddChild(y);Di2015NewLine                y.Mark = false;Di2015NewLine                a[d] = null;Di2015NewLine                d++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            a[d] = x;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _min = null;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < a.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var n = a[i];Di2015NewLine            if (n == null)Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            if (_min == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _root.Clear();Di2015NewLine                _min = n;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (Comparer<TKey>.Default.Compare(n.Key, _min.Key) < 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _min = n;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            _root.Add(n);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int UpperBound()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (int)Math.Floor(Math.Log(_count, (1.0 + Math.Sqrt(5)) / 2.0)) + 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class NodeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public TKey Key;Di2015NewLine        public TValue Value;Di2015NewLine        public Node Parent;Di2015NewLine        public List<Node> Children = new List<Node>();Di2015NewLine        public bool Mark;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void AddChild(Node child)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            child.Parent = this;Di2015NewLine            Children.Add(child);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return string.Format("({0},{1})", Key, Value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10240852Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ConcreteXmlObjectSerializer : XmlObjectSerializerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    readonly Type objectType;Di2015NewLine    XmlSerializer serializer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ConcreteXmlObjectSerializer(Type objectType)Di2015NewLine        : this(objectType, null, null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ConcreteXmlObjectSerializer(Type objectType, string wrapperName, string wrapperNamespace)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (objectType == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("objectType");Di2015NewLine        if ((wrapperName == null) != (wrapperNamespace == null))Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("wrapperName and wrapperNamespace must be either both null or both non-null.");Di2015NewLine        if (wrapperName == string.Empty)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Cannot be the empty string.", "wrapperName");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.objectType = objectType;Di2015NewLine        if (wrapperName != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            XmlRootAttribute root = new XmlRootAttribute(wrapperName);Di2015NewLine            root.Namespace = wrapperNamespace;Di2015NewLine            this.serializer = new XmlSerializer(objectType, root);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            this.serializer = new XmlSerializer(objectType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool IsStartObject(XmlDictionaryReader reader)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object ReadObject(XmlDictionaryReader reader, bool verifyObjectName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(serializer != null);Di2015NewLine        if (reader == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("reader");Di2015NewLine        if (!verifyObjectName)Di2015NewLine            throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return serializer.Deserialize(reader);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void WriteStartObject(XmlDictionaryWriter writer, object graph)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void WriteObjectContent(XmlDictionaryWriter writer, object graph)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (writer == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("writer");Di2015NewLine        if (writer.WriteState != WriteState.Element)Di2015NewLine            throw new SerializationException(string.Format("WriteState '{0}' not valid. Caller must write start element before serializing in contentOnly mode.",Di2015NewLine                writer.WriteState));Di2015NewLine        using (MemoryStream memoryStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (XmlDictionaryWriter bufferWriter = XmlDictionaryWriter.CreateTextWriter(memoryStream, Encoding.UTF8))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                serializer.Serialize(bufferWriter, graph);Di2015NewLine                bufferWriter.Flush();Di2015NewLine                memoryStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine                using (XmlReader reader = new XmlTextReader(memoryStream))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    reader.MoveToContent();Di2015NewLine                    writer.WriteAttributes(reader, false);Di2015NewLine                    if (reader.Read()) // move off start node (we want to skip it)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        while (reader.NodeType != XmlNodeType.EndElement) // also skip end node.Di2015NewLine                            writer.WriteNode(reader, false); // this will take us to the start of the next child node, or the end node.Di2015NewLine                        reader.ReadEndElement(); // not necessary, but cleanDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void WriteEndObject(XmlDictionaryWriter writer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void WriteObject(XmlDictionaryWriter writer, object graph)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(serializer != null);Di2015NewLine        if (writer == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("writer");Di2015NewLine        serializer.Serialize(writer, graph);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10248673Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void BulkInsertToSQL(DataTable dt, string tableName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                using (SqlConnection con = new SqlConnection(_DB))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    SqlBulkCopy sbc = new SqlBulkCopy(con);Di2015NewLine                    sbc.DestinationTableName = tableName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //if your DB col names dont match your data table column names 100%Di2015NewLine                    //then relate the source data table column names with the destination DB colsDi2015NewLine                    sbc.ColumnMappings.Add("DBAttributeName1", "DTColumnName1");Di2015NewLine                    sbc.ColumnMappings.Add("DBAttributeName2", "DTColumnName2");Di2015NewLine                    sbc.ColumnMappings.Add("DBAttributeName3", "DTColumnName3");Di2015NewLine                    sbc.ColumnMappings.Add("DBAttributeName4", "DTColumnName4");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    con.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    sbc.WriteToServer(dt);Di2015NewLine                    con.Close();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

10249839Di2015UniqueSeparator[Serializable]Di2015NewLinepublic class PreventEventHookedTwiceAttribute: EventInterceptionAspectDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly object _lockObject = new object();Di2015NewLine    readonly List<Delegate> _delegates = new List<Delegate>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void OnAddHandler(EventInterceptionArgs args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock(_lockObject)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(!_delegates.Contains(args.Handler))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _delegates.Add(args.Handler);Di2015NewLine                args.ProceedAddHandler();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void OnRemoveHandler(EventInterceptionArgs args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock(_lockObject)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(_delegates.Contains(args.Handler))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _delegates.Remove(args.Handler);Di2015NewLine                args.ProceedRemoveHandler();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10249839Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static readonly object _lockObject = new object();Di2015NewLine        private static int _counter = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [PreventEventHookedTwice]Di2015NewLine        public static event Action<string> GoodEvent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static event Action<string> BadEvent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void Handler (string message)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock(_lockObject)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(_counter +": "+ message);Di2015NewLine                _counter++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            GoodEvent += Handler;Di2015NewLine            GoodEvent += Handler;Di2015NewLine            GoodEvent += Handler;Di2015NewLine            GoodEvent += Handler;Di2015NewLine            GoodEvent += Handler;Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Firing Good Event. Good Event is subscribed 5 times from the same Handler.");Di2015NewLine            GoodEvent("Good Event is Invoked.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _counter = 1;Di2015NewLine            BadEvent += Handler;Di2015NewLine            BadEvent += Handler;Di2015NewLine            BadEvent += Handler;Di2015NewLine            BadEvent += Handler;Di2015NewLine            BadEvent += Handler;Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Firing Bad Event. Bad Event is subscribed 5 times from the same Handler.");Di2015NewLine            BadEvent("Bad Event is Invoked.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _counter = 1;Di2015NewLine            GoodEvent -= Handler;Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("GoodEvent is unsubscribed just once. Now fire the Event");Di2015NewLine            if(GoodEvent!= null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                GoodEvent("Good Event Fired");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Event is not received to Handler.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            BadEvent -= Handler;Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("BadEvent is unsubscribed just once. Now fire the Event");Di2015NewLine            BadEvent("Good Event Fired");Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Event is fired 4 times. If u subscribe good event 5 times then u have to unscribe it for 5 times, otherwise u will be keep informed.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10250897Di2015UniqueSeparator    static readonly string invalidXmlChars =Di2015NewLine        Enumerable.Range(0, 0x20)Di2015NewLine        .Where(i => !(i == '\\u000A' || i == '\\u000D' || i == '\\u0009'))Di2015NewLine        .Select(i => (char)i)Di2015NewLine        .ConcatToString()Di2015NewLine        + "\\uFFFE\\uFFFF";Di2015NewLine    public static string RemoveInvalidXmlChars(string str)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return RemoveInvalidXmlChars(str, false);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    internal static string RemoveInvalidXmlChars(string str, bool forceRemoveSurrogates)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (str == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("str");Di2015NewLine        if (!ContainsInvalidXmlChars(str, forceRemoveSurrogates))Di2015NewLine            return str;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        str = str.RemoveCharset(invalidXmlChars);Di2015NewLine        if (forceRemoveSurrogates)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < str.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (IsSurrogate(str[i]))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    str = str.Where(c => !IsSurrogate(c)).ConcatToString();Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return str;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static bool IsSurrogate(char c)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return c >= 0xD800 && c < 0xE000;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    internal static bool ContainsInvalidXmlChars(string str)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ContainsInvalidXmlChars(str, false);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static bool ContainsInvalidXmlChars(string str, bool forceRemoveSurrogates)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (str == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("str");Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < str.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (str[i] < 0x20 && !(str[i] == '\\u000A' || str[i] == '\\u000D' || str[i] == '\\u0009'))Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            if (str[i] >= 0xD800)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (forceRemoveSurrogates && str[i] < 0xE000)Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine                if ((str[i] == '\\uFFFE' || str[i] == '\\uFFFF'))Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10253591Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> Traverse<T>(Di2015NewLine    T root, Di2015NewLine    Func<T, IEnumerable<T>> children)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var stack = new Stack<T>();Di2015NewLine    stack.Push(root);Di2015NewLine    while(stack.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T item = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine        yield return item;Di2015NewLine        foreach(var child in children(item))Di2015NewLine            stack.Push(child);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10253591Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> Traverse<T>(Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<T> roots, Di2015NewLine    Func<T, IEnumerable<T>> children)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return from root in roots Di2015NewLine           from item in Traverse(root, children)Di2015NewLine           select item ;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10253591Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> Closure<T>(Di2015NewLine    T root, Di2015NewLine    Func<T, IEnumerable<T>> children)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var seen = new HashSet<T>();Di2015NewLine    var stack = new Stack<T>();Di2015NewLine    stack.Push(root);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while(stack.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T item = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine        if (seen.Contains(item))Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        seen.Add(item);Di2015NewLine        yield return item;Di2015NewLine        foreach(var child in children(item))Di2015NewLine            stack.Push(child);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10253835Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MapperItemDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public MapperItem(MemberInfo member, object o)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Member = member;Di2015NewLine        this.Object = o;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MemberInfo Member Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        get; Di2015NewLine        set; Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object ObjectDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get;Di2015NewLine        set;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Type TypeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return this.Member.UnderlyingType();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object ValueDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (this.Member is PropertyInfo)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return (this.Member as PropertyInfo).GetValue(this.Object, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (this.Member is FieldInfo)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return (this.Member as FieldInfo).GetValue(this.Object);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception("sourceMember must be either PropertyInfo or FieldInfo");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object Convert(Type targetType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object converted = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (this.Value == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return converted;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (targetType.IsAssignableFrom(this.Type))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            converted = this.Value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var conversionKey = Tuple.Create(this.Type, targetType);Di2015NewLine            if (Conversions.ContainsKey(conversionKey))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                converted = Conversions[conversionKey](this.Value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception(targetType.Name + " is not assignable from " + this.Type.Name);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return converted;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Assign(object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.Member is PropertyInfo)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            (this.Member as PropertyInfo).SetValue(this.Object, value, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (this.Member is FieldInfo)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            (this.Member as FieldInfo).SetValue(this.Object, value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("destinationMember must be either PropertyInfo or FieldInfo");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Dictionary<Tuple<Type, Type>, Func<object, object>> Conversions = new Dictionary<Tuple<Type, Type>, Func<object, object>>();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Mapper<S, T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private List<string> ignoreList = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    public List<string> IgnoreListDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return ignoreList; }Di2015NewLine        set { ignoreList = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void MapProperties(S source, T target, bool failIfNotMatched = true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyInfo property in source.GetType()Di2015NewLine                                                      .GetProperties()Di2015NewLine                                                      .Where(c => !IgnoreList.Contains(c.Name)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var sourceField = new MapperItem(property, source);Di2015NewLine                var targetField = new MapperItem(MatchToTarget(property), target);Di2015NewLine                targetField.Assign(sourceField.Convert(targetField.Type));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (TargetNotMatchedException noMatch)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (failIfNotMatched)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw noMatch;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private MemberInfo MatchToTarget(MemberInfo member)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<MemberInfo> members = new List<MemberInfo>();Di2015NewLine        members.AddRange(typeof(T).GetProperties());Di2015NewLine        members.AddRange(typeof(T).GetFields());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var exactMatch = from c in members where c.Name == member.Name select c;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (exactMatch.FirstOrDefault() != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return exactMatch.First();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var sameAlphaChars = from c in membersDi2015NewLine                             where NormalizeName(c.Name) == NormalizeName(member.Name)Di2015NewLine                             select c;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (sameAlphaChars.FirstOrDefault() != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return sameAlphaChars.First();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        throw new TargetNotMatchedException(member, typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string NormalizeName(string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string normalized = input.Replace("_", "").ToUpper();Di2015NewLine        return normalized;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class TargetNotMatchedException : ExceptionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public TargetNotMatchedException(MemberInfo member, Type type)Di2015NewLine        : base("no match for member named " + member.Name + " with type named " + type.Name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Member = member;Di2015NewLine        this.Type = type;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public MemberInfo Member { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Type Type { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class ReflectionExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Type UnderlyingType(this MemberInfo member)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type type;Di2015NewLine        switch (member.MemberType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case MemberTypes.Field:Di2015NewLine                type = ((FieldInfo)member).FieldType;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case MemberTypes.Property:Di2015NewLine                type = ((PropertyInfo)member).PropertyType;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case MemberTypes.Event:Di2015NewLine                type = ((EventInfo)member).EventHandlerType;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("MemberInfo must be if type FieldInfo, PropertyInfo or EventInfo", "member");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return Nullable.GetUnderlyingType(type) ?? type;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10256237Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace RegExDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string original = "([+\\\\-*/%()]{1}|[=<>!]{1,2}|[&|]{2})";Di2015NewLine            string lordcheeto = @"\\s*(==|&&|<=|>=|<|>)\\s*";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string input = "Name=='mynme' && CurrentTime<45 - 10258083Di2015UniqueSeparatorBrushes.Transparent
10258083Di2015UniqueSeparator[ValueConversion(typeof(double), typeof(Brush))]Di2015NewLineclass ValueToBrushConverter : IValueConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public object Convert(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double number = (double)value;Di2015NewLine        double min = 0;Di2015NewLine        double max = 100;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the value limits from parameterDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string[] limits = (parameter as string).Split(new char[] { '|' });Di2015NewLine            min = double.Parse(limits[0], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine            max = double.Parse(limits[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Parameter not valid. Enter in format: 'MinDouble|MaxDouble'");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (max <= min)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Parameter not valid. MaxDouble has to be greater then MinDouble.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (number >= min && number <= max)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Calculate color channelsDi2015NewLine            double range = (max - min) / 2;Di2015NewLine            number -= max - range;Di2015NewLine            double factor = 255 / range;Di2015NewLine            double red = number < 0 ? number * factor : 255;Di2015NewLine            double green = number > 0 ? (range - number) * factor : 255;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create and return brushDi2015NewLine            Color color = Color.FromRgb((byte)red, (byte)green, 0);Di2015NewLine            SolidColorBrush brush = new SolidColorBrush(color);Di2015NewLine            return brush;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Fallback brushDi2015NewLine        return Brushes.Transparent;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object ConvertBack(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10260767Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass OpenXmlPowerToolsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static string SCRIPT_PATH = @"..\\MergeDocuments.ps1";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void UsingPowerShell(string[] filesToMerge, string outputFilename)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // create Powershell runspaceDi2015NewLine        Runspace runspace = RunspaceFactory.CreateRunspace();Di2015NewLine        runspace.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        RunspaceInvoke runSpaceInvoker = new RunspaceInvoke(runspace);Di2015NewLine        runSpaceInvoker.Invoke("Set-ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create a pipeline and feed it the script textDi2015NewLine        Pipeline pipeline = runspace.CreatePipeline();Di2015NewLine        Command command = new Command(SCRIPT_PATH);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var file in filesToMerge)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            command.Parameters.Add(null, file);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        command.Parameters.Add(null, outputFilename);Di2015NewLine        pipeline.Commands.Add(command);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        pipeline.Invoke();Di2015NewLine        runspace.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}

10261848Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate FieldInfo[] GetConstants(System.Type type)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ArrayList constants = new ArrayList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    FieldInfo[] fieldInfos = type.GetFields(Di2015NewLine        // Gets all public and static fieldsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Static | Di2015NewLine        // This tells it to get the fields from all base types as wellDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Go through the list and only pick out the constantsDi2015NewLine    foreach(FieldInfo fi in fieldInfos)Di2015NewLine        // IsLiteral determines if its value is written at Di2015NewLine        //   compile time and not changeableDi2015NewLine        // IsInitOnly determine if the field can be set Di2015NewLine        //   in the body of the constructorDi2015NewLine        // for C# a field which is readonly keyword would have both true Di2015NewLine        //   but a const field would have only IsLiteral equal to trueDi2015NewLine        if(fi.IsLiteral && !fi.IsInitOnly)Di2015NewLine            constants.Add(fi);           Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Return an array of FieldInfosDi2015NewLine    return (FieldInfo[])constants.ToArray(typeof(FieldInfo));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10261848Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate List<FieldInfo> GetConstants(Type type)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    FieldInfo[] fieldInfos = type.GetFields(BindingFlags.Public |Di2015NewLine         BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return fieldInfos.Where(fi => fi.IsLiteral && !fi.IsInitOnly).ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10261848Di2015UniqueSeparatortype.GetFields(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Static |Di2015NewLine               BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy)Di2015NewLine    .Where(fi => fi.IsLiteral && !fi.IsInitOnly).ToList();Di2015NewLine
