10262339Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring input = @"Di2015NewLine    Section Z              0 __ base 10Di2015NewLine                           2 __ 19/04 20:06:39Di2015NewLine                           2 __ 19/04 20:15:49Di2015NewLine                         1.8 __ 19/04 20:09:35Di2015NewLine                         1.6 __ 19/04 20:07:01Di2015NewLine                         1.6 __ 19/04 20:08:29Di2015NewLine    Section P           16.1 __ base 2Di2015NewLine    Section 7            0.8 __ base 10Di2015NewLine                           8 __ 18/04 21:03:01Di2015NewLine                         7.3 __ 18/04 21:02:17Di2015NewLine                         3.7 __ 19/04 08:41:09Di2015NewLine                         3.4 __ 19/04 00:13:08Di2015NewLine                         3.3 __ 18/04 21:02:50Di2015NewLine    Section C              0 __ base 10Di2015NewLine                        19.7 __ 19/04 10:25:06Di2015NewLine                        11.1 __ 19/04 10:15:01Di2015NewLine                         8.8 __ 19/04 10:14:50Di2015NewLine                         7.2 __ 19/04 19:51:37Di2015NewLine                         6.1 __ 19/04 14:19:47Di2015NewLine    Section r           49.2 __ Base 2Di2015NewLine";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring regex = @"Di2015NewLine   # base 10 statistic sectionsDi2015NewLine       (?:Di2015NewLine         [\\s-[\\n\\r]]*(?i:Section\\s(?<base10_Section>Z|7|C)\\s+(?<Base10>\\d+\\.\\d|\\d+)\\s__\\sbase)\\s10Di2015NewLine         (?:\\r?\\n)+Di2015NewLine         (?:\\s+(?<Instance>\\d+\\.\\d|\\d+)\\s__\\s(?<Time>\\d\\d/\\d\\d\\s\\d\\d:\\d\\d:\\d\\d)(?:\\r?\\n)+)+Di2015NewLine       )Di2015NewLine     |  # Or, base 2 statistic sectionsDi2015NewLine       (?:Di2015NewLine         [\\s-[\\n\\r]]*(?i:Section\\s(?<base2_Section>R|P)\\s+(?<Base2>\\d+\\.\\d|\\d+)\\s__\\sbase)\\s2Di2015NewLine         (?:\\r?\\n)+Di2015NewLine       )Di2015NewLine   # |  Or, something elseDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineMatch m = Regex.Match(input, regex, RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace);Di2015NewLineint matchCount = 0;Di2015NewLinewhile (m.Success)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("\\nMatch " + (++matchCount) + "\\n------------------");Di2015NewLine    // Check base 10Di2015NewLine    if (m.Groups["base10_Section"].Success)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Section (base10)  '" + m.Groups["base10_Section"] + "'  =  '" + m.Groups["Base10"] + "'\\n");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int count = m.Groups["Instance"].Captures.Count;Di2015NewLine        // InstanceDi2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < count; j++)Di2015NewLine            System.Console.WriteLine("    Instance (" + j + ") =  '" + m.Groups["Instance"].Captures[j] + "' ");Di2015NewLine        // TimeDi2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < count; j++)Di2015NewLine            System.Console.WriteLine("    Time(" + j + ") =  '" + m.Groups["Time"].Captures[j] + "' ");Di2015NewLine        // Combined ..Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < count; j++)Di2015NewLine            System.Console.WriteLine("    Instance,Time  (" + j + ") =  '" +Di2015NewLine                                          m.Groups["Instance"].Captures[j] + "' __ '" +Di2015NewLine                                          m.Groups["Time"].Captures[j] + "' ");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    // Check base 2Di2015NewLine    if (m.Groups["base2_Section"].Success)Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Section (base2)  '" + m.Groups["base2_Section"] + "'  =  '" + m.Groups["Base2"] + "'\\n");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    m = m.NextMatch();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10263239Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Charge(string bankaccountnumber, decimal moneyamount)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (OleDbConnection connection = new OleDbConnection("Provider=Microsoft.ACE.OLEDB.12.0; Data Source= C:\\\\asd.accdb"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        connection.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (OleDbCommand cmd = new OleDbCommand())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            cmd.Connection = connection;Di2015NewLine            cmd.CommandText = "SELECT accounNum, WholeAccountBalance, BalanceAmountAvailableForWithdrawal FROM Account WHERE accounNum = @accNum";Di2015NewLine            cmd.Parameters.AddWithValue("@accNum", bankaccountnumber);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (OleDbDataReader reader = cmd.ExecuteReader())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (reader.Read())  //assuming accounNum is an unique field (primary key)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    decimal balanceAmountAvailableForWithdrawal = Convert.ToDecimal(reader["BalanceAmountAvailableForWithdrawal"]);Di2015NewLine                    if (balanceAmountAvailableForWithdrawal >= moneyamount)   //check if you can withdraw moneyDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        cmd.CommandText = @"UPDATE Account Di2015NewLine                                            SET WholeAccountBalance = WholeAccountBalance - @moneyamount, Di2015NewLine                                                BalanceAmountAvailableForWithdrawal = BalanceAmountAvailableForWithdrawal - @moneyamount Di2015NewLine                                            WHERE accounNum = @accNum";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        cmd.Parameters.AddWithValue("@moneyamount", moneyamount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        int result = cmd.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (result == 1)Di2015NewLine                            Console.WriteLine("Money withdrawn sucessfully.");Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                            Console.WriteLine("Error while withdrawing, operation has failed.");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Console.WriteLine("Not enough money to withdrawn requested ammount.");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Charging did not work");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10267018Di2015UniqueSeparator    protected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine        /* Configuration Start */Di2015NewLine        string thumb_directory = "img/thumbs";Di2015NewLine        string orig_directory = "img/original";Di2015NewLine        int stage_width = 600;Di2015NewLine        int stage_height = 480;Di2015NewLine        Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // array of allowed file type extensionsDi2015NewLine        string[] allowed_types = { "bmp", "gif", "png", "jpg", "jpeg", "doc", "xls" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /* Opening the thumbnail directory and looping through all the thumbs: */Di2015NewLine        foreach (string file in Directory.GetFiles(thumb_directory)) {Di2015NewLine            string title = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(file);Di2015NewLine            if (allowed_types.Contains(Path.GetExtension(file)) == true) {Di2015NewLine                int left = random.Next(0, stage_width);Di2015NewLine                int top = random.Next(0, 400);Di2015NewLine                int rotation = random.Next(-40, -40);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if ((top > stage_height - 130) && (left > stage_width - 230)) {Di2015NewLine                    top -= 120 + 130;Di2015NewLine                    left -= 230;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10267816Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IQueryable<LogViewer.EF.InternetEF.Log> ExecuteInternetGetLogsQuery(FilterCriteria p_Criteria, ref GridView p_Datagrid)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            IQueryable<LogViewer.EF.InternetEF.Log> internetQuery = null;Di2015NewLine            List<LogViewer.EF.InternetEF.Log> executedList = null;Di2015NewLine            using (InternetDBConnectionString context = new InternetDBConnectionString())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                internetQuery = context.Logs;Di2015NewLine                if ((p_Criteria.DateTo != null && p_Criteria.DateFrom != null))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    internetQuery = internetQuery.Where(c => c.Timestamp >= p_Criteria.DateFrom.Value && c.Timestamp < p_Criteria.DateTo.Value);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (p_Criteria.DateFrom != null && p_Criteria.DateFrom > DateTime.MinValue)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    internetQuery = internetQuery.Where(c => c.Timestamp >= p_Criteria.DateFrom);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (p_Criteria.DateTo != null && p_Criteria.DateTo > DateTime.MinValue)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    internetQuery = internetQuery.Where(c => c.Timestamp < p_Criteria.DateTo);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(p_Criteria.FreeText))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    internetQuery = internetQuery.Where(c => c.FormattedMessage.Contains(p_Criteria.FreeText));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (p_Criteria.Titles.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    internetQuery = internetQuery.Where(BuildOrExpression<LogViewer.EF.InternetEF.Log, string>(p => p.Title, p_Criteria.Titles));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (p_Criteria.MachineNames.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    internetQuery = internetQuery.Where(BuildOrExpression<LogViewer.EF.InternetEF.Log, string>(p => p.MachineName, p_Criteria.MachineNames));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (p_Criteria.Severities.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    internetQuery = internetQuery.Where(BuildOrExpression<LogViewer.EF.InternetEF.Log, string>(p => p.Severity, p_Criteria.Severities));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                internetQuery = internetQuery.Take(p_Criteria.TopValue);Di2015NewLine                executedList = internetQuery.ToList<LogViewer.EF.InternetEF.Log>();Di2015NewLine                executedList = executedList.OrderByDescending(c => c.LogID).ToList<LogViewer.EF.InternetEF.Log>(); ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                p_Datagrid.DataSource = executedList;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                p_Datagrid.DataBind();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return internetQuery;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static Expression<Func<TElement, bool>> BuildOrExpression<TElement, TValue>(Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<TElement, TValue>> valueSelector,Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<TValue> values )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (null == valueSelector)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("valueSelector");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (null == values)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("values");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ParameterExpression p = valueSelector.Parameters.Single();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!values.Any())Di2015NewLine                return e => false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var equals = values.Select(value =>Di2015NewLine                (Expression)Expression.Equal(Di2015NewLine                     valueSelector.Body,Di2015NewLine                     Expression.Constant(Di2015NewLine                         value,Di2015NewLine                         typeof(TValue)Di2015NewLine                     )Di2015NewLine                )Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var body = equals.Aggregate<Expression>(Di2015NewLine                     (accumulate, equal) => Expression.Or(accumulate, equal)Di2015NewLine             );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return Expression.Lambda<Func<TElement, bool>>(body, p);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

10268711Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Searches the logs for matching recordsDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="fromUTC">Start point timestamp of the search</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="toUTC">End point timestamp of the search</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="ofSeverity">Severity level of the log entry</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="orHigher">Retrieve more severe log entries as well that match</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sourceStartsWith">The source field starts with these characters</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="usernameStartsWith">The username field starts with these characters</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="maxRecords">The maximum number of records to return</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>A list of Log objects with attached UserProfile objects</returns>Di2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<Log> SearchLogs(Di2015NewLine        DateTime fromUTC,Di2015NewLine        DateTime toUTC,Di2015NewLine        string ofSeverity,Di2015NewLine        bool orHigher,Di2015NewLine        string sourceStartsWith,Di2015NewLine        string usernameStartsWith,Di2015NewLine        int maxRecords)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ofSeverity = ofSeverity ?? "INFO";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var query = DetachedCriteria.For<Log>()Di2015NewLine            .SetFetchMode("UserProfile", NHibernate.FetchMode.Eager)Di2015NewLine            .Add(Restrictions.In("Severity", (orHigher ?Di2015NewLine                Translator.SeverityOrHigher(ofSeverity) : Translator.Severity(ofSeverity)).ToArray()))Di2015NewLine            .Add(Restrictions.Between("TimeStamp", fromUTC, toUTC))Di2015NewLine            .AddOrder(Order.Desc("TimeStamp"))Di2015NewLine            .SetMaxResults(maxRecords);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(usernameStartsWith))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            query.CreateCriteria("UserProfile")Di2015NewLine                .Add(Restrictions.InsensitiveLike("UserName",Di2015NewLine                usernameStartsWith, MatchMode.Start));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(sourceStartsWith))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            queryDi2015NewLine                .Add(Restrictions.InsensitiveLike("Source", sourceStartsWith, MatchMode.Start));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return query.GetExecutableCriteria(_Session).List<Log>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

   }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else{Di2015NewLine                        //Use logging or similar to record that there are no rows. 10269600Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static async Task SerializeToFileEncrypt<T>(T o, StorageFile file)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        DataContractSerializer dsc = new DataContractSerializer(typeof(T));                Di2015NewLine        MemoryStream memoryStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine        dsc.WriteObject(memoryStream, o);Di2015NewLine        memoryStream.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin); // move to the beginning of the streamDi2015NewLine        DataProtectionProvider provider = new DataProtectionProvider("Local=User");Di2015NewLine        var raStream = await file.OpenAsync(FileAccessMode.ReadWrite);Di2015NewLine        using(var filestream = raStream.GetOutputStreamAt(0))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            await provider.ProtectStreamAsync(memoryStream.AsInputStream(), filestream);Di2015NewLine            await filestream.FlushAsync();                        Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static async Task<T> DeserializeFromFileDecrypt<T>(StorageFile file)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DataContractSerializer dsc = new DataContractSerializer(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    MemoryStream memoryStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    DataProtectionProvider provider = new DataProtectionProvider();Di2015NewLine    await provider.UnprotectStreamAsync((await file.OpenStreamForReadAsync()).AsInputStream(), memoryStream.AsOutputStream());Di2015NewLine    memoryStream.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin); // move to the beginning of the streamDi2015NewLine    return (T) dsc.ReadObject(memoryStream);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10269722Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static IEnumerable<TSource> ExceptImpl<TSource>(Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<TSource> first,Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<TSource> second,Di2015NewLine    IEqualityComparer<TSource> comparer)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    HashSet<TSource> bannedElements = new HashSet<TSource>(second, comparer);Di2015NewLine    foreach (TSource item in first)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (bannedElements.Add(item))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return item;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10269780Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void ToggleConfigEncryption(string exeConfigName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Takes the executable file name without theDi2015NewLine    // .config extension.Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Open the configuration file and retrieve Di2015NewLine        // the connectionStrings section.Di2015NewLine        Configuration config = ConfigurationManager.Di2015NewLine            OpenExeConfiguration(exeConfigName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ConnectionStringsSection section =Di2015NewLine            config.GetSection("connectionStrings")Di2015NewLine            as ConnectionStringsSection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (section.SectionInformation.IsProtected)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Remove encryption.Di2015NewLine            section.SectionInformation.UnprotectSection();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Encrypt the section.Di2015NewLine            section.SectionInformation.ProtectSection(Di2015NewLine                "DataProtectionConfigurationProvider");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Save the current configuration.Di2015NewLine        config.Save();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Protected={0}",Di2015NewLine            section.SectionInformation.IsProtected);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10270000Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CapitalizerComparer : IComparer<string>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Compare(string x, string y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int[] xCount = new int[26];Di2015NewLine        int[] yCount = new int[26];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach(char c in x)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (char.IsUpper(c))Di2015NewLine                xCount[c-'A']++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (char c in y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (char.IsUpper(c))Di2015NewLine                yCount[c-'A']++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < xCount.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(xCount[i] > yCount[i])Di2015NewLine                return -1;Di2015NewLine            else if(yCount[i] > xCount[i])Di2015NewLine                return 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return x.CompareTo(y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10276321Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[fnc_List2Table] (Di2015NewLine    @list      varchar(8000),Di2015NewLine    @delimiter varchar(16) = ','Di2015NewLine) RETURNS @result TABLE (Di2015NewLine    ListIndex int,Di2015NewLine    Value varchar(8000)Di2015NewLine)Di2015NewLineASDi2015NewLineBEGINDi2015NewLine    SET @list = LTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(@list, SPACE(0))))Di2015NewLine    DECLARE @n int, @i int, @delimiterIndex int, @nextItem varchar(8000)Di2015NewLine    SET @n = LEN('#' + @delimiter + '#') - 2Di2015NewLine    SET @i = 0Di2015NewLine    WHILE @list <> SPACE(0)Di2015NewLine    BEGINDi2015NewLine        SET @i = @i + 1Di2015NewLine        SET @delimiterIndex = CHARINDEX(@delimiter, @list)Di2015NewLine        IF @delimiterIndex = 0Di2015NewLine        BEGINDi2015NewLine            SET @nextItem = LTRIM(RTRIM(@list))Di2015NewLine            SET @list = SPACE(0)Di2015NewLine        ENDDi2015NewLine        ELSEDi2015NewLine        BEGINDi2015NewLine            SET @nextItem = LTRIM(RTRIM(LEFT(@list, @delimiterIndex-1)))Di2015NewLine            SET @list = RIGHT(@list, LEN(@list)-(@delimiterIndex+(@n-1)))Di2015NewLine        ENDDi2015NewLine        INSERT INTO @result (ListIndex, Value)Di2015NewLine        VALUES (@i, @nextItem)Di2015NewLine    ENDDi2015NewLine    RETURNDi2015NewLineENDDi2015NewLine

10280582Di2015UniqueSeparator                using (Stream stream = new FileStream(Di2015NewLine                 pubAttFullPath.ToString(),Di2015NewLine                 FileMode.Open,Di2015NewLine                 FileAccess.Read,Di2015NewLine                 FileShare.Read))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    context.Response.AddHeader("Accept-Ranges", "bytes");Di2015NewLine                    context.Response.Buffer = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (context.Request.Headers["Range"] != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        context.Response.StatusCode = 206;Di2015NewLine                        string[] range = context.Request.Headers["Range"].Split(new[] { '=', '-' });Di2015NewLine                        startBytes = Convert.ToInt32(range[1]);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    int dataToRead = size - startBytes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    context.Response.ContentType = "application/octet-stream";Di2015NewLine                    context.Response.AddHeader("Content-Length", dataToRead.ToString());Di2015NewLine                    context.Response.AddHeader("Connection", "Keep-Alive");Di2015NewLine                    context.Response.AddHeader("Content-Disposition", "attachment; filename=" + HttpUtility.UrlEncode(fileName, Encoding.UTF8));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (startBytes > 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        context.Response.AddHeader("Content-Range", string.Format(" bytes {0}-{1}/{2}", startBytes, size - 1, size));Di2015NewLine                        stream.Seek(startBytes, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    while (dataToRead > 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Verify that the client is connected.Di2015NewLine                        if (context.Response.IsClientConnected)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            // Read the data in buffer.Di2015NewLine                            int length = stream.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            // Write the data to the current output stream.Di2015NewLine                            context.Response.OutputStream.Write(buffer, 0, length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            // Flush the data to the HTML output.Di2015NewLine                            context.Response.Flush();Di2015NewLine                            dataToRead = dataToRead - length;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            // prevent infinite loop if user disconnectsDi2015NewLine                            dataToRead = -1;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine

10289137Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool operator ==(Task t1, Task t2)         Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (object.ReferenceEquals(t1, t2)) return true;Di2015NewLine    // All right. We know that they are (1) not the same object, andDi2015NewLine    // (2) not both null. 10293940Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class RelayCommand : ICommand, IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    #region FieldsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<EventHandler> _canExecuteSubscribers = new List<EventHandler>();Di2015NewLine    readonly Action<object> _execute;Di2015NewLine    readonly Predicate<object> _canExecute;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregion // FieldsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region ConstructorsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public RelayCommand(Action<object> execute)Di2015NewLine        : this(execute, null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public RelayCommand(Action<object> execute, Predicate<object> canExecute)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (execute == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("execute");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _execute = execute;Di2015NewLine        _canExecute = canExecute;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregion // ConstructorsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region ICommandDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DebuggerStepThrough]Di2015NewLine    public bool CanExecute(object parameter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _canExecute == null ? 10293940Di2015UniqueSeparatorDispose()

10294575Di2015UniqueSeparatorPoint[] shapePoints; //already initializedDi2015NewLineint numPoints; //already initializedDi2015NewLinePoint[] retPoints = new Point[numPoints];Di2015NewLineint totalLength;Di2015NewLinefor(int i = 1; i < shapePoints.length; i++){Di2015NewLine    totalLength += distance(shapePoints[i], (shapePoints[i-1]));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinefloat segLength = ((float) totalLength) / numPoints);Di2015NewLinePoint currShape = shapePoints[0];Di2015NewLinePoint nextShape = shapePoints[1];Di2015NewLinePoint prev = currShape;Di2015NewLineint counter = 2;Di2015NewLinewhile(numPoints > 0){Di2015NewLine    Point norm = normalize(new Point(nextShape.x - currShape.x, nextShape.y - currShape.y));Di2015NewLine    if(distance(nextShape, prev) < segLength){Di2015NewLine        int tempLength = segLength;Di2015NewLine        tempLength -= distance(nextShape, prev);Di2015NewLine        currShape = nextShape;Di2015NewLine        nextShape = shapePoints[counter];Di2015NewLine        counter ++;Di2015NewLine        norm = normalize(new Point(nextShape.x - currShape.x, nextShape.y - currShape.y));Di2015NewLine        norm.multiply(tempLength);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else{Di2015NewLine        norm.multiply(segLength);Di2015NewLine    }       Di2015NewLine    retPoints[numPoints - 1] = norm;Di2015NewLine    prev = retPoints[numPoints - 1];Di2015NewLine    numPoints --;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10294575Di2015UniqueSeparatorPoint normalize(Point p){Di2015NewLine    int scale = Math.sqrt(p.x * p.x + p.y * p.y);Di2015NewLine    p.x = p.x / scale;Di2015NewLine    p.y = p.y / scale;Di2015NewLine    return p;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10305050Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Media;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Media.Imaging;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ColorWheelDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///   Interaction logic for MainWindow.xamlDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public partial class MainWindow : WindowDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public MainWindow()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void BuildWheel()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var width = 1024;Di2015NewLine            var height = width;Di2015NewLine            var cx = width/2;Di2015NewLine            var cy = height/2;Di2015NewLine            var colors = new int[width*height];Di2015NewLine            var gray = Colors.Gray.ToBgr32();Di2015NewLine            for (int index = 0; index < colors.Length; index++) colors[index] = gray;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var radius = cx;Di2015NewLine            var radiusSquared = radius*radius;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < height; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int j = 0; j < width; j++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var x = j - cx;Di2015NewLine                    var y = i - cy;Di2015NewLine                    var distanceSquared = (double) x*x + y*y;Di2015NewLine                    if (distanceSquared <= radiusSquared) // In circleDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        var h = Math.Atan2(x, y).ToDegrees() + 180.0d; // AngleDi2015NewLine                        var s = 1.0d;Di2015NewLine                        var l = (1.0d - ((1.0d/radiusSquared)*distanceSquared)); // 1 - (distance normalized)Di2015NewLine                        var hsl = new HSL((float) h, (float) s, (float) l);Di2015NewLine                        var rgb = RGB.FromHsl(hsl.H, hsl.S, hsl.L);Di2015NewLine                        colors[i*width + j] = rgb.R << 16 | rgb.G << 8 | rgb.B;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            var bitmap = new WriteableBitmap(width, height, 96, 96, PixelFormats.Bgr32, null);Di2015NewLine            bitmap.WritePixels(new Int32Rect(0, 0, width, height), colors, width*4, 0);Di2015NewLine            image.Source = bitmap;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void Window_Loaded(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            BuildWheel();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static class HelpersDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static double ToDegrees(this double radians)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return radians*57.2957795130823; // radians * (180.0d / Math.PI)Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static double ToRadians(this double degrees)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return degrees*0.0174532925199433; // degrees * (Math.PI / 180.0d)Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static class ColorExtensionsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static Color FromBgr32(this Int32 color)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Color.FromRgb((byte) ((color & 0xFF0000) >> 16), (byte) ((color & 0xFF00) >> 8), (byte) (color & 0xFF));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static int ToBgr32(this Color color)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return color.R << 16 | color.G << 8 | color.B;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///   Represents a color in an HSL space.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLine    public struct HSLDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        [DebuggerBrowsable(DebuggerBrowsableState.Never)] private readonly double _h;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DebuggerBrowsable(DebuggerBrowsableState.Never)] private readonly double _s;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DebuggerBrowsable(DebuggerBrowsableState.Never)] private readonly double _l;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        ///   Returns the fully qualified type name of this instance.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns> A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing a fully qualified type name. </returns>Di2015NewLine        /// <filterpriority>2</filterpriority>Di2015NewLine        public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return string.Format("H: {0}, S: {1}, L: {2}", _h, _s, _l);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        ///   Create a new instance of <see cref="HSL" /> .Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="h"> Value of <see cref="H" /> component. </param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="s"> Value of <see cref="S" /> component. </param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="l"> Value of <see cref="L" /> component. </param>Di2015NewLine        public HSL(double h, double s, double l)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _h = h;Di2015NewLine            _s = s;Di2015NewLine            _l = l;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        ///   Gets the value of the hue component.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public double HDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _h; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        ///   Gets the value of the saturation component.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public double SDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _s; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        ///   Gets the value of the lightness component.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public double LDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _l; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override bool Equals(object obj)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (ReferenceEquals(null, obj)) return false;Di2015NewLine            if (obj.GetType() != typeof (HSL)) return false;Di2015NewLine            return Equals((HSL) obj);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool Equals(HSL other)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return other._h.Equals(_h) && other._l.Equals(_l) &&Di2015NewLine                   other._s.Equals(_s);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        ///   Create a new instance of <see cref="HSL" /> , from RGB values.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="red"> Value of the red component. </param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="green"> Value of the green component. </param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="blue"> Value of the blue component. </param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns> <see cref="HSL" /> instance created. </returns>Di2015NewLine        public static HSL FromRGB(byte red, byte green, byte blue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var r1 = red/255.0d;Di2015NewLine            var g1 = green/255.0d;Di2015NewLine            var b1 = blue/255.0d;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var min = Math.Min(r1, Math.Min(g1, b1));Di2015NewLine            var max = Math.Max(r1, Math.Max(g1, b1));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var l = (max + min)/2.0d;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var s = 0.0d;Di2015NewLine            var h = 0.0d;Di2015NewLine            if (min == max)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                h = 0.0d;Di2015NewLine                s = 0.0d;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (l < 0.5d)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    s = (max - min)/(max + min);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (l >= 0.5d)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    s = (max - min)/(2.0d - max - min);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (r1 == max)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    h = (g1 - b1)/(max - min);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (g1 == max)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    h = 2.0d + (b1 - r1)/(max - min);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (b1 == max)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    h = 4.0d + (r1 - g1)/(max - min);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            h *= 60.0d;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (h < 0.0d)Di2015NewLine                h += 360.0d;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return new HSL(h, s, l);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        ///   Returns the hash code for this instance.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns> A 32-bit signed integer that is the hash code for this instance. </returns>Di2015NewLine        /// <filterpriority>2</filterpriority>Di2015NewLine        public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            uncheckedDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var result = _h.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine                result = (result*397) ^ _l.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine                result = (result*397) ^ _s.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine                return result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static BitmapSource GetHslPalette(int width = 360, int height = 100)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Creates an HSL palette image like in Photoshop, etc ...Di2015NewLine            var pixels = new int[width*height];Di2015NewLine            const double saturation = 1.0d;Di2015NewLine            for (var y = 0; y < height; y++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (var x = 0; x < width; x++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var hue = (1.0d/width)*x*360.0d;Di2015NewLine                    var lightness = 1.0d - ((1.0f/height)*y);Di2015NewLine                    var rgb = RGB.FromHsl(hue, saturation, lightness);Di2015NewLine                    pixels[y*width + x] = 0xFF << 24 | rgb.R << 16 | rgb.G << 8 | rgb.B;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return BitmapSource.Create(width, height, 96, 96, PixelFormats.Pbgra32, null, pixels, width*4);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static bool operator ==(HSL left, HSL right)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return left.Equals(right);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static bool operator !=(HSL left, HSL right)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return !left.Equals(right);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///   Represents a color in an RGB space.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLine    public struct RGBDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        [DebuggerBrowsable(DebuggerBrowsableState.Never)] private readonly byte _r;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DebuggerBrowsable(DebuggerBrowsableState.Never)] private readonly byte _g;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DebuggerBrowsable(DebuggerBrowsableState.Never)] private readonly byte _b;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        ///   Create a new instance of <see cref="RGB" /> .Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="r"> Value of red component. </param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="g"> Value of green component. </param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="b"> Value of blue component. </param>Di2015NewLine        public RGB(byte r, byte g, byte b)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _r = r;Di2015NewLine            _g = g;Di2015NewLine            _b = b;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        ///   Returns the fully qualified type name of this instance.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns> A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing a fully qualified type name. </returns>Di2015NewLine        /// <filterpriority>2</filterpriority>Di2015NewLine        public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return string.Format("R: {0}, G: {1}, B: {2}", _r, _g, _b);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        ///   Gets the value of the red component.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public byte RDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _r; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        ///   Gets the value of the green component.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public byte GDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _g; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        ///   Gets the value of the blue component.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public byte BDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _b; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override bool Equals(object obj)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (ReferenceEquals(null, obj)) return false;Di2015NewLine            if (obj.GetType() != typeof (RGB)) return false;Di2015NewLine            return Equals((RGB) obj);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool Equals(RGB other)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return other._b == _b && other._g == _g && other._r == _r;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        ///   Create a new instance of <see cref="RGB" /> , from HSL values.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="hue"> Hue, from 0.0 to 360.0. </param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="saturation"> Saturation, from 0.0 to 1.0. </param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="lightness"> Lightness, from 0.0 to 1.0. </param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns> <see cref="RGB" /> instance created. </returns>Di2015NewLine        public static RGB FromHsl(double hue, double saturation, double lightness)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (hue < 0.0d || hue > 360.0d) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("hue");Di2015NewLine            if (saturation < 0.0d || saturation > 1.0d) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("saturation");Di2015NewLine            if (lightness < 0.0d || lightness > 1.0d) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("lightness");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (saturation == 0.0d)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var b1 = (byte) (lightness*255);Di2015NewLine                return new RGB(b1, b1, b1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var t2 = 0.0d;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (lightness < 0.5d)Di2015NewLine                t2 = lightness*(1.0d + saturation);Di2015NewLine            else if (lightness >= 0.5d)Di2015NewLine                t2 = lightness + saturation - lightness*saturation;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var t1 = 2.0d*lightness - t2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var h = hue/360.0d;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var tr = h + 1.0d/3.0d;Di2015NewLine            var tg = h;Di2015NewLine            var tb = h - 1.0d/3.0d;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tr = tr < 0.0d ? tr + 1.0d : tr > 1.0d ? tr - 1.0d : tr;Di2015NewLine            tg = tg < 0.0d ? tg + 1.0d : tg > 1.0d ? tg - 1.0d : tg;Di2015NewLine            tb = tb < 0.0d ? tb + 1.0d : tb > 1.0d ? tb - 1.0d : tb;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            double r;Di2015NewLine            if (6.0d*tr < 1.0d)Di2015NewLine                r = t1 + (t2 - t1)*6.0d*tr;Di2015NewLine            else if (2.0d*tr < 1.0d)Di2015NewLine                r = t2;Di2015NewLine            else if (3.0d*tr < 2.0d)Di2015NewLine                r = t1 + (t2 - t1)*((2.0d/3.0d) - tr)*6.0d;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                r = t1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            double g;Di2015NewLine            if (6.0d*tg < 1.0d)Di2015NewLine                g = t1 + (t2 - t1)*6.0d*tg;Di2015NewLine            else if (2.0d*tg < 1.0d)Di2015NewLine                g = t2;Di2015NewLine            else if (3.0d*tg < 2.0d)Di2015NewLine                g = t1 + (t2 - t1)*((2.0d/3.0d) - tg)*6.0d;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                g = t1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            double b;Di2015NewLine            if (6.0d*tb < 1.0d)Di2015NewLine                b = t1 + (t2 - t1)*6.0d*tb;Di2015NewLine            else if (2.0d*tb < 1.0d)Di2015NewLine                b = t2;Di2015NewLine            else if (3.0d*tb < 2.0d)Di2015NewLine                b = t1 + (t2 - t1)*((2.0d/3.0d) - tb)*6.0d;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                b = t1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return new RGB((byte) (r*255), (byte) (g*255), (byte) (b*255));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        ///   Returns the hash code for this instance.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns> A 32-bit signed integer that is the hash code for this instance. </returns>Di2015NewLine        /// <filterpriority>2</filterpriority>Di2015NewLine        public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            uncheckedDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var result = _b.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine                result = (result*397) ^ _g.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine                result = (result*397) ^ _r.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine                return result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static bool operator ==(RGB left, RGB right)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return left.Equals(right);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static bool operator !=(RGB left, RGB right)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return !left.Equals(right);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10306332Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Server()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    TcpListener listener = new TcpListener(IPAddress.Any, 3128);Di2015NewLine    listener.Start();Di2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var client = listener.AcceptTcpClient();Di2015NewLine        new Thread(() =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (client)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var reader = new StreamReader(client.GetStream());Di2015NewLine                var writer = new StreamWriter(client.GetStream());Di2015NewLine                while (true)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string line = reader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine                    if (line == "QUIT") break;Di2015NewLine                    writer.WriteLine("From Thread[" + Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId + "] > " + line);Di2015NewLine                    writer.Flush();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }).Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10306366Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void Document_Printed(object sender, PrintPageEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine  float scale;Di2015NewLine  SizeF pageSize = new SizeF(Di2015NewLine    PrintPreview.Document.DefaultPageSettings.PaperSize.Width,Di2015NewLine    PrintPreview.Document.DefaultPageSettings.PaperSize.HeightDi2015NewLine  );Di2015NewLine  Margins m = PrintPreview.Document.DefaultPageSettings.Margins;Di2015NewLine  float printableHeight = pageSize.Height - (m.Top + m.Bottom);Di2015NewLine  float printableWidth = pageSize.Width - (m.Left + m.Right);Di2015NewLine  if (printableWidth < printableHeight) {Di2015NewLine    if (labelSize.Width < labelSize.Height) {Di2015NewLine      float r1 = printableWidth / labelSize.Width;Di2015NewLine      float r2 = printableHeight / labelSize.Height;Di2015NewLine      scale = (r1 < r2) ? r1 : r2;Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLine      scale = printableWidth / labelSize.Width;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  } else {Di2015NewLine    if (labelSize.Width < labelSize.Height) {Di2015NewLine      scale = (printableHeight) / labelSize.Height;Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLine      float r1 = printableWidth / labelSize.Width;Di2015NewLine      float r2 = printableHeight / labelSize.Height;Di2015NewLine      scale = (r1 < r2) ? r1 : r2;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  float lh = scale * labelSize.Height;Di2015NewLine  float lw = scale * labelSize.Width;Di2015NewLine  float ml = scale * m.Left;Di2015NewLine  float mt = scale * m.Top;Di2015NewLine  Graphics G = e.Graphics;Di2015NewLine  G.SmoothingMode = smoothMode;Di2015NewLine  G.TextRenderingHint = TextRenderingHint.AntiAlias;Di2015NewLine  for (int i = 0; (i < LabelsHorizontal) && !e.Cancel; i++) {Di2015NewLine    float dx = i * (lw + ml); // Horizontal shift * scaleDi2015NewLine    for (int j = 0; (j < LabelsVertical) && !e.Cancel; j++) {Di2015NewLine      float dy = j * (lh + mt); // Vertical shift * scaleDi2015NewLine      #region ' Panels 'Di2015NewLine      foreach (Panel item in panels) {Di2015NewLine        float h = scale * item.Size.Height;Di2015NewLine        float w = scale * item.Size.Width;Di2015NewLine        float x = (ml + dx) + scale * item.Location.X;Di2015NewLine        float y = (mt + dy) + scale * item.Location.Y;Di2015NewLine        using (SolidBrush b = new SolidBrush(item.BackColor)) {Di2015NewLine          G.FillRectangle(b, x, y, w, h);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        using (Pen p = new Pen(Brushes.Black)) {Di2015NewLine          G.DrawRectangle(p, x, y, w, h);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      #endregionDi2015NewLine      #region ' Logo 'Di2015NewLine      if (logo != null) {Di2015NewLine        float h = scale * logo.Height;Di2015NewLine        float w = scale * logo.Width;Di2015NewLine        float x = (ml + dx) + scale * logoPt.X;Di2015NewLine        float y = (mt + dy) + scale * logoPt.Y;Di2015NewLine        G.DrawImage(logo, x, y, w, h);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      #endregionDi2015NewLine      #region ' Labels 'Di2015NewLine      foreach (Label item in labels) {Di2015NewLine        float h = scale * item.Size.Height;Di2015NewLine        float w = scale * item.Size.Width;Di2015NewLine        float x = (ml + dx) + scale * item.Location.X;Di2015NewLine        float y = (mt + dy) + scale * item.Location.Y;Di2015NewLine        Color c = PrintPreview.Document.DefaultPageSettings.Color ? item.ForeColor : Color.Black;Di2015NewLine        Font font = new Font(item.Font.FontFamily, scale * item.Font.Size, item.Font.Style);Di2015NewLine        using (SolidBrush b = new SolidBrush(c)) {Di2015NewLine          StringFormat format = GetStringFormatFromContentAllignment(item.TextAlign);Di2015NewLine          format.FormatFlags = StringFormatFlags.NoClip | StringFormatFlags.NoWrap;Di2015NewLine          format.Trimming = StringTrimming.None;Di2015NewLine          PointF locationF = new PointF(x, y);Di2015NewLine          SizeF size = new SizeF(w, h);Di2015NewLine          RectangleF r = new RectangleF(locationF, size);Di2015NewLine          G.DrawString(item.Text, font, b, r, format);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      #endregionDi2015NewLine      #region ' Barcodes 'Di2015NewLine item.Location.Y;Di2015NewLine          G.DrawImage(img, x, y, w, h);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      #endregionDi2015NewLine      labelsPrinted++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10308324Di2015UniqueSeparatorSendNamedStrings
10308324Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic WebResponse SendNamedStrings(string url, Dictionary<string, string> namedStrings)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  string postData = "?" + string.Join("&", namedStrings.Select(pair => string.Format("{0}={1}", pair.Key, pair.Value)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  WebRequest request = WebRequest.Create(url);Di2015NewLine  request.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine  byte[] byteArray = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(postData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  request.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine  request.ContentLength = byteArray.Length;Di2015NewLine  Stream dataStream = request.GetRequestStream();Di2015NewLine  dataStream.Write(byteArray, 0, byteArray.Length);Di2015NewLine  dataStream.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10311536Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static int called;Di2015NewLineprivate const int ITERATIONS = 10000;Di2015NewLineprivate static Stopwatch sw;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var x = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DoGateIteration();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        x.Restart();Di2015NewLine        while (x.ElapsedMilliseconds < 2) ; // busy-wait for 2 msDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void DoGateIteration()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    called++;Di2015NewLine    if (called == ITERATIONS)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Average iterations per second: " + ITERATIONS * 1000 / sw.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Average iterations milliseconds: " + sw.ElapsedMilliseconds / ITERATIONS);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

                 }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(ex.ToString());Di2015NewLine            }            Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static byte[] StringToByteArray(string hex)Di2015NewLine 10320534Di2015UniqueSeparatorStandard SecurityDi2015NewLineData Source=myServerAddress;Initial Catalog=myDataBase;User Id=myUsername;Password=myPassword;Di2015NewLineUse serverName\\instanceName as Data Source to connect to a specific SQL Server instance.Di2015NewLineAre you using SQL Server 2008 Express? Don't miss the server name syntax Servername\\SQLEXPRESS where you substitute Servername with the name of the computer where the SQL Server Express installation resides.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCOPYDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineStandard Security alternative syntaxDi2015NewLineThis connection string produce the same result as the previous one. The reason to include it is to point out that some connection string keywords have many equivalents.Di2015NewLineServer=myServerAddress;Database=myDataBase;User ID=myUsername;Password=myPassword;Trusted_Connection=False;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCOPYDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTrusted ConnectionDi2015NewLineData Source=myServerAddress;Initial Catalog=myDataBase;Integrated Security=SSPI;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCOPYDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTrusted Connection alternative syntaxDi2015NewLineThis connection string produce the same result as the previous one. The reason to include it is to point out that some connection string keywords have many equivalents.Di2015NewLineServer=myServerAddress;Database=myDataBase;Trusted_Connection=True;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCOPYDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConnecting to an SQL Server instanceDi2015NewLineThe syntax of specifying the server instance in the value of the server key is the same for all connection strings for SQL Server.Di2015NewLineServer=myServerName\\theInstanceName;Database=myDataBase;Trusted_Connection=True;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCOPYDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTrusted Connection from a CE deviceDi2015NewLineOften a Windows CE device is not authenticated and logged in to a domain. To use SSPI or trusted connection / authentication from a CE device, use this connection string.Di2015NewLineData Source=myServerAddress;Initial Catalog=myDataBase;Integrated Security=SSPI;User ID=myDomain\\myUsername;Password=myPassword;Di2015NewLineNote that this will only work on a CE device.Di2015NewLineRead more about connecting to SQL Server from CE devices hereDi2015NewLine

10324868Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void ResizeImageFreeSize(string OriginalFile, string NewFile, int MinWidth, int MinHeight, string FileExtension)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var NewHeight = MinHeight;Di2015NewLine    var NewWidth = MinWidth;        Di2015NewLine    var OriginalImage = Image.FromFile(OriginalFile);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (OriginalImage.Width < MinWidth || OriginalImage.Height < MinHeight)Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception(String.Format("Invalid Image Dimensions, please upload an image with minmum dimensions of {0}x{1}px", MinWidth.ToString(), MinHeight.ToString()));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If the image dimensions are the same then make the new dimensions the largest of the two mins.Di2015NewLine    if (OriginalImage.Height == OriginalImage.Width)Di2015NewLine        NewWidth = NewHeight = (MinWidth > MinHeight) ? MinWidth : MinHeight;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (MinWidth > MinHeight)Di2015NewLine            NewHeight = (int)(OriginalImage.Height * ((float)MinWidth / (float)OriginalImage.Width));Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            NewWidth  = (int)(OriginalImage.Width * ((float)MinHeight / (float)OriginalImage.Height));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Just resample the Original Image into a new BitmapDi2015NewLine    var ResizedBitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(OriginalImage, NewWidth, NewHeight);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Saves the new bitmap in the same format as it's source imageDi2015NewLine    FileExtension = FileExtension.ToLower().Replace(".","");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ImageFormat Format = null;Di2015NewLine    switch (FileExtension)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case "jpg":Di2015NewLine            Format = ImageFormat.Jpeg;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case "gif":Di2015NewLine            Format = ImageFormat.Gif;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case "png":Di2015NewLine            Format = ImageFormat.Png;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            Format = ImageFormat.Png;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ResizedBitmap.Save(NewFile, Format);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Clear handle to original file so that we can overwrite it if necessaryDi2015NewLine    OriginalImage.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    ResizedBitmap.Dispose();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10327807Di2015UniqueSeparatorStopwatch stopWatch = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLinestopWatch.Start();Di2015NewLineArray.Sort(input, delegate(string x, string y)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (x == y)Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int shortestLength = Math.Min(x.Length, y.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (i = 0; i < shortestLength; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (x[i] < 91 && y[i] < 91)Di2015NewLine            return x.CompareTo(y);Di2015NewLine        else if (x[i] < 91)Di2015NewLine            return -1;Di2015NewLine        else if (y[i] < 91)Di2015NewLine            return 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return x.CompareTo(y);Di2015NewLine});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestopWatch.Stop();Di2015NewLinedouble ms = (stopWatch.ElapsedTicks * 1000.0) / Stopwatch.Frequency;Di2015NewLineDebug.WriteLine("Optimized Time: " + ms);Di2015NewLine
10327807Di2015UniqueSeparatorStopwatch stopWatch = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLinestopWatch.Start();Di2015NewLineArray.Sort(input, delegate(string x, string y)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (x == y)Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int xlen = x.Length;Di2015NewLine    int ylen = y.Length;Di2015NewLine    int longestLength = Math.Max(xlen, ylen);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (i = 0; i < longestLength; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (i < xlen && i < ylen && x[i] < 91 && y[i] < 91)Di2015NewLine            return x.CompareTo(y);Di2015NewLine        else if (i < xlen && x[i] < 91)Di2015NewLine            return -1;Di2015NewLine        else if (i < ylen && y[i] < 91)Di2015NewLine            return 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return x.CompareTo(y);Di2015NewLine});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestopWatch.Stop();Di2015NewLinedouble ms = (stopWatch.ElapsedTicks * 1000.0) / Stopwatch.Frequency;Di2015NewLineDebug.WriteLine("Optimized Time: " + ms);Di2015NewLine

10331360Di2015UniqueSeparator// This is the class we are going to add to a ListDi2015NewLinepublic class DynamicClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // property is a class that will create dynamic properties at runtimeDi2015NewLine    private DynamicProperty _property = new DynamicProperty();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DynamicProperty propertyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _property; }Di2015NewLine        set { _property = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class DynamicPropertyDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // a Dictionary that hold all the dynamic property valuesDi2015NewLine    private Dictionary<string, object> properties = new Dictionary<string, object>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // the property call to get any dynamic property in our Dictionary, or "" if none found.Di2015NewLine    public object this[string name]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (properties.ContainsKey(name))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return properties[name];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return "";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            properties[name] = value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10331360Di2015UniqueSeparator// create a List of String that are going to be our dynamic class's properties.Di2015NewLineList<string> PropertyNames = new List<string>();Di2015NewLinePropertyNames.Add("Name");Di2015NewLinePropertyNames.Add("Age");Di2015NewLinePropertyNames.Add("Phone");Di2015NewLinePropertyNames.Add("Address");Di2015NewLinePropertyNames.Add("City");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Make a list of the DynamicClassDi2015NewLineList<DynamicClass> DynamicClassList = new List<DynamicClass>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Adding 5 DynamicClass classes to the DynamicClassListDi2015NewLinefor (int cc = 0; cc < 5; cc++ )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // declare a new DynamicClassDi2015NewLine    var dynamicClass = new DynamicClass();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Give Random values to the New Properties. Di2015NewLine    // (because dynamicClass.property["xxx"] is of type object it could be anything.)Di2015NewLine    // I'm just going to use random strings.Di2015NewLine    foreach (String PropertyName in PropertyNames)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        dynamicClass.property[PropertyName] = RandomString(5 + cc); // private string RandomString(int size)Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // It could also have looked something like this. Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // dynamicClass.property["Name"] = "Peter";Di2015NewLine    // dynamicClass.property["Age"] = 25;Di2015NewLine    // ....Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add the populated class to the list.Di2015NewLine    DynamicClassList.Add(dynamicClass);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Again I want the User to be able to select which fields (properties) they want to show in the DataGrid.Di2015NewLineString selectQuery = GetSelectedFields(); // private string GetSelectedFields() { return ... }Di2015NewLine// selectQuery will then be something like.Di2015NewLineselectQuery = "new (property[\\"Name\\"] as Name, " +Di2015NewLine    " property[\\"Age\\"] as Age, " +Di2015NewLine    " property[\\"Phone\\"] as Phone, " +Di2015NewLine    " property[\\"Address\\"] + \\" \\" + property[\\"City\\"] as Address)";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Make a new DynamicClass that only contains the fields the user wants to see.Di2015NewLinevar newDynamicClasses = DynamicClassList.AsQueryable().Select(selectQuery);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// I Found that this was the easiest way to get the "var" back to a List, to add to the .DataSourceDi2015NewLine// because the IQueryable above does not have a .ToList();Di2015NewLineList<object> newDynamicClassList = new List<object>();Di2015NewLineforeach (var varDynamicClass in newDynamicClasses)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    newDynamicClassList.Add(varDynamicClass);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// populate the dataGridView1.DataSource with the New List of DynamicClassDi2015NewLinedataGridView1.DataSource = newDynamicClassList;Di2015NewLine

10332941Di2015UniqueSeparatorDownloadFileCompleted
10332941Di2015UniqueSeparatorCancelled
10332941Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void OnDownloadFileCompleted(object sender, AsyncCompletedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (e.Cancelled)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.CleanUp(); // Method that disposes the client and unhooks eventsDi2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (e.Error != null) // We have an error! Retry a few times, then abort.Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.retryCount < RetryMaxCount)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.retryCount++;Di2015NewLine            this.CleanUp();Di2015NewLine            this.Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // The re-tries have failed, abort download.Di2015NewLine        this.CleanUp();Di2015NewLine        this.errorMessage = "Downloading " + this.fileName + " failed.";Di2015NewLine        this.RaisePropertyChanged("ErrorMessage");Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     this.message = "Downloading " + this.fileName + " complete!";Di2015NewLine     this.RaisePropertyChanged("Message");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     this.progress = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     this.CleanUp();Di2015NewLine     this.RaisePropertyChanged("DownloadCompleted");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10334085Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void DivideSubArray(int[] array)Di2015NewLine{       Di2015NewLine    int currentOdd=0;Di2015NewLine    List<int> even = new List<int>(array.Length / 2);Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < array.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ((array[i] % 2) != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            even.Add(array[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (currentOdd != i)Di2015NewLine                array[currentOdd++] = array[i];Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                currentOdd++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    even.CopyTo(array, currentOdd);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10334320Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static unsafe bool IsGrayScale(Image image)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var bmp = new Bitmap(image.Width, image.Height, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var g = Graphics.FromImage(bmp))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            g.DrawImage(image, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var data = bmp.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, bmp.Width, bmp.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, bmp.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var pt = (int*)data.Scan0;Di2015NewLine        var res = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < data.Height * data.Width; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var color = Color.FromArgb(pt[i]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (color.A != 0 && (color.R != color.G || color.G != color.B))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                res = false;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bmp.UnlockBits(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return res;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10334401Di2015UniqueSeparator private static dynamic ToSport(XElement sportElement)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var getAttrib = new Func<XElement, string, string>((x, atr) => x.Attribute(atr).Value);Di2015NewLine            var getDictionary =Di2015NewLine                new Func<IEnumerable<XElement>, IDictionary<string, string>>(elems => elems.ToDictionary(x => x.Attribute("name").Value, y => y.Attribute("value").Value));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            dynamic n = new ExpandoObject();Di2015NewLine            n.SportName = sportElement.Attribute("name").Value;Di2015NewLine            n.EventProperties = getDictionary(sportElement.Element("eventProperties").Elements("property"));Di2015NewLine            n.CompetitionProperties = getDictionary(sportElement.Element("competitionProperties").Elements("property"));Di2015NewLine            n.MappedMarkets = sportElement.Element("mapping").Elements("market").Select(x => new MappedMarket() { Type = getAttrib(x, "type"), MappedType = getAttrib(x, "mappedType") });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return n;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            throw ex;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10339040Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass BackupOptionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public IEnumerable<string> ExtensionsToAllow { get; set; }Di2015NewLine  public IEnumerable<string> ExtensionsToIgnore { get; set; }Di2015NewLine  public IEnumerable<string> NamesToIgnore { get; set; }Di2015NewLine  public bool CaseInsensitive { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public BackupOptions()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    ExtensionsToAllow = new string[] { };Di2015NewLine    ExtensionsToIgnore = new string[] { };Di2015NewLine    NamesToIgnore = new string[] { };Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void Backup(string sourcePath, string destinationPath, BackupOptions options = null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (options == null)Di2015NewLine    optionns = new BackupOptions();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  string[] files = Directory.GetFiles(sourcePath, ".", SearchOption.AllDirectories);Di2015NewLine  StringComparison comp = options.CaseInsensitive ? StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase : StringComparison.CurrentCulture;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  foreach (var file in files)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    FileInfo info = new FileInfo(file);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (options.ExtensionsToAllow.Count() > 0 &&Di2015NewLine      !options.ExtensionsToAllow.Any(allow => info.Extension.Equals(allow, comp)))Di2015NewLine      continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (options.ExtensionsToIgnore.Any(ignore => info.Extension.Equals(ignore, comp)))Di2015NewLine        continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (options.NamesToIgnore.Any(ignore => info.Name.Equals(ignore, comp)))Di2015NewLine      continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      File.Copy(info.FullName, destinationPath + "\\\\" + info.Name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      // report/handle errorDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10339105Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyViewModelDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string LetterRange { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string[] Titles { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10339105Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic ActionResult Index()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The model could be of any form and come from anywhere butDi2015NewLine    // the important thing is that at the end of the day you will haveDi2015NewLine    // a list of titles hereDi2015NewLine    var model = new[] Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        "17\\" Screen", Di2015NewLine        "100GB HD", Di2015NewLine        "10788 Firewire", Di2015NewLine        "Lock Cable", Di2015NewLine        "Monitor",Di2015NewLine        "Mouse", Di2015NewLine        "Keyboard",Di2015NewLine        "USB" Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Now let's map this domain model into a view model Di2015NewLine    // that will be adapted to the requirements of our view.Di2015NewLine    // And the requirements of this view is to group the titlesDi2015NewLine    // in ranges of 3 letters of the alphabetDi2015NewLine    var viewModel = EnumerableDi2015NewLine        .Range(65, 26)Di2015NewLine        .Select((letter, index) => new Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            Letter = ((char)letter).ToString(), Di2015NewLine            Index = index Di2015NewLine        })Di2015NewLine        .GroupBy(g => g.Index / 3)Di2015NewLine        .Select(g => g.Select(x => x.Letter).ToArray())Di2015NewLine        .Select(range => new MyViewModelDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            LetterRange = string.Format("{0}-{1}", range.First(), range.Last()),Di2015NewLine            Titles = modelDi2015NewLine                .Where(item => item.Length > 0 && range.Contains(item.Substring(0, 1)))Di2015NewLine                .ToArray()Di2015NewLine        })Di2015NewLine        .ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Let's add those titles that weren't starting with an alphabet letterDi2015NewLine    var other = new MyViewModelDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        LetterRange = "Other",Di2015NewLine        Titles = model.Where(item => !viewModel.Any(x => x.Titles.Contains(item))).ToArray()Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // and merge them into the final view modelDi2015NewLine    viewModel = new[] { other }.Concat(viewModel).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return View(viewModel);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10341793Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string GetStringBetweenStrings(string source, string leftString, string rightString)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int start = source.IndexOf(leftString); // assume != -1Di2015NewLine    int end = source.IndexOf(rightString);  // assume != -1 and >= startDi2015NewLine    if (start == -1 || end == -1 || end < start) return String.Empty;Di2015NewLine    return source.Substring(start + leftString.Length, end - start - rightString.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10341793Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string GetStringBetweenStrings(string source, string leftString, string rightString)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Regex.Match(source, String.Format(@"(?<={0})(.*)(?={1})", Di2015NewLine                       Regex.Escape(leftString),Di2015NewLine                       Regex.Escape(rightString)))Di2015NewLine                       .Captures[0].Value;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

name="T">The type to serialize.</typeparam>Di2015NewLinepublic static class XmlManager<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Static method SerializeFromFileDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="path">Di2015NewLine    /// The path.Di2015NewLine    /// </param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Di2015NewLine    /// returns TDi2015NewLine    /// </returns>Di2015NewLine    public static T SerializeFromFile(string path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (var xmlStream = new FileStream(path, FileMode.Open))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return FromStream(xmlStream);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return default(T);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Method FromStreamDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="xmlStream">Di2015NewLine    /// The xml stream.Di2015NewLine    /// </param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Di2015NewLine    /// returns TDi2015NewLine    /// </returns>Di2015NewLine    public static T FromStream(Stream xmlStream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var xmlReader = XmlReader.Create(xmlStream);Di2015NewLine            var serializer = new XmlSerializer(typeof(T));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var value = (T)serializer.Deserialize(xmlReader);Di2015NewLine            return value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return default(T);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Method SerializeToFileDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="xmlObject">Di2015NewLine    /// The xml object.Di2015NewLine    /// </param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="xmlPath">Di2015NewLine    /// The xml path.Di2015NewLine    /// </param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="overwriteExisting">Di2015NewLine    /// The overwrite existing.Di2015NewLine    /// </param>Di2015NewLine    public static void SerializeToFile(T xmlObject, string xmlPath, bool overwriteExisting)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var mode = overwriteExisting ? FileMode.Create : FileMode.CreateNew;Di2015NewLine            using (var xmlStream = new FileStream(xmlPath, mode))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ToStream(xmlObject, xmlStream);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Method ToStreamDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="xmlObject">Di2015NewLine    /// The xml object.Di2015NewLine    /// </param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="xmlStream">Di2015NewLine    /// The xml stream.Di2015NewLine    /// </param>Di2015NewLine    public static void ToStream(T xmlObject, Stream xmlStream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var xmlSettings = new XmlWriterSettings { Indent = true, NewLineOnAttributes = false };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var writer = XmlWriter.Create(xmlStream, xmlSettings);Di2015NewLine            var serializer = new XmlSerializer(typeof(T));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            serializer.Serialize(writer, xmlObject);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
